programme.title: XX Ray 2
programme.desc: Bekerja sebagai saintis kadet, Tina berasa ditipu apabila Johan mendakwa dia yang mencipta mesin pelupusan laser walhal ia merupakan hasil cetusan idea dari Tina. Ingin menghalang niat jahat Johan, Tina meminta bantuan Amir. Namun, keduanya terkena pancaran laser mesin itu dalam cubaan untuk menghalang Johan dan telah dihantar ke zaman Kesultanan Melayu Melaka.

programme.desc: Pingkan (Velove Vexia), seorang pensyarah muda di Universitas Sastera Jepang Indonesia, berpeluang belajar di Jepun selama dua tahun. Sarwono (Adipati Dolken) sedih mendengar berita bahawa dia akan ditinggalkan oleh Pingkan.

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: Seri dan Nasir adalah wartawan dan jurugambar yang gigih mencari scoop dalam liputan berita mereka. Selepas membuat scoop sindiket rokok di pulau pinang Nasir pulang ke Kuala Lumpur. Nasir terkejut apabila melihat isterinya sedang berasmara dengan lelaki lain di biliknya.

programme.title: Misterius
programme.desc: Kematian Sumiyati membawa malapetaka kepada keluarga Lestari Soecipto. Sumiyati merupakan pekerja sebuah syarikat pakaian milik Lestari, seorang balu anak dua iaitu Agus dan Wulan. Keluarga Lestari sering didatangi roh-roh yang mengembara. Lestari memanggil orang yang bijak, Pak Gozali. Encik Gozali mendedahkan segala rahsia tentang roh yang mengembara ini.

programme.desc: Sekumpulan pelajar dari bandar pergi meredah hutan dengan bantuan seorang pemburu muda sebagai pemandu pelancong. programme.desc: Roy adalah anak kepada orang kaya yang ingin bebas dan bergaul dengan pemuzik di kelab malam. Anak Tengku Aziz bertunang dengan Tengku Johan. Tengku Aziz menggaji Tengku Johan sebagai pengarah eksekutif syarikatnya.

programme.title: Ehsan Love Story
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki tampan bernama Sian yang berasal dari Utara Thailand. Sian dibesarkan oleh ibunya selepas kematian bapanya. Sian yang baru habis belajar menunggu kepulangan teman wanitanya bernama Som yang belajar di Bangkok.

programme.title: Abang Cupang Mendadak Sayang
programme.desc: Anita melarikan diri dari rumah kerana perkahwinan yang diatur oleh ibu bapanya. Dia terserempak dengan Afton, seorang penjual ikan cupang. Anita dan Afton selalu bertengkar. Pada suatu hari, Anita membantu Afton menjual ikan cupangnya di jalanan. Mereka lebih mengenali antara satu sama lain dan jatuh cinta.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep126
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: D'Star Ep14
programme.desc: D'Star ialah pertandingan nyanyian berprestij di mana 30 penyanyi bersaing untuk menjadi All-Stars'. Penyanyi ini adalah dari D'Academy, Selebriti D'Academy, Liga Dangdut Indonesia, dan Bintang Pantura. Mereka akan mempersembahkan pelbagai genre muzik dan menunjukkan kemahiran mereka.

programme.title: Sejadah Ep28
programme.desc: Sejadah (Sehat Jadi Ibadah) adalah program yang akan memberikan maklumat mengenai kesihatan dari perspektif perubatan dan aspek lain. Dihoskan oleh pakar kesihatan Dr Cahyono, Sp.Naturophaty dan Ustadz Solmed.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep57
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep105
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. programme.title: Detak Jantung di Detik Yang Berbeda
programme.desc: Jasmine yang menghidap penyakit jantung teruk sembuh dengan bantuan penderma jantung Nindy. Jasmine ingin tahu untuk mengenal pasti siapa yang menyelamatkan nyawanya, dan dia akhirnya mengetahui bahawa Nindy adalah orang yang memberikan kepadanya. Suatu hari, Dion melawat kubur Nindy dan memberitahu dia masih tidak boleh meneruskan kehidupannya dan terlalu trauma untuk menjalinkan hubungan semula. Namun, Jasmine terkilan kerana jantung Nindy berdegup kencang di dalam dirinya. Untuk membalas budi baik Nindy, Jasmine ingin menjaga Dion sebagaimana dia menjaga hatinya.

programme.title: Kalau Cinta Sudah Menjadi Bubur
programme.desc: Selepas menghabiskan bubur di gerai Rahmat, Maria terus melarikan diri. Lagipun, dia kecewa kerana teman lelakinya meminta putus. Namun siapa sangka pertemuan awal yang berakhir dengan pergaduhan membuahkan cinta antara Rahmat dan Maria?

programme.title: The Sultan S2 Ep50

programme.title: Kata Ustadz Solmed Ep10
programme.desc: Kata Ustadz Solmed merupakan program bual bicara yang dibimbing oleh pengacara dan ustaz terkenal yang akan fokus membincangkan tentang masalah yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat sehinggalah masalah rumah tangga dari sudut agama.

programme.title: Golden Memories Asia Ep10
programme.desc: Golden Memories Asia merupakan acara pencarian bakat untuk menyanyikan lagu-lagu nostalgia atau lagu lama dari tahun 1970-an hingga 2000-an, dihadiri oleh enam negara Asia Tenggara iaitu Brunei Darussalam, Indonesia, Malaysia, Filipina, Singapura, dan Timor Leste. Program ini adalah untuk memupuk kegembiraan dan keseronokan, serta satu bentuk persahabatan antara negara.

programme.title: Midnight Runners
programme.desc: Two students from Korean National Police University decide to work together and track down a kidnapping incident.

programme.title: Innocent Witness
programme.desc: A housekeeper is charged with murder. Her attorney is surprised to learn the only witness to the crime is a teenage girl with Asperger's. Will the girl be able to provide a valid statement?

programme.title: Midnight
programme.desc: Kyung-mi with hearing impairment trying to save another girl from a killer becomes the prey herself. As the killer gains trust from the police, a life-threatening chase begins...

programme.title: The Battleship Island
programme.desc: During the colonial rule of Japan, around 400 Koreans are conscripted into slave labor on Hashima Island. As the island’s dark secrets are revealed, the Korean labourers plot to escape.

programme.title: Rv: Resurrected Victims
programme.desc: Surreal cases are reported globally where victims come back to life to avenge the murderer. One day, prosecutor Jin-hong’s dead mother returns home and tries to kill him…

programme.title: Confidential Assignment 2: International
programme.desc: N. Korea detective returns for another secret mission. Despite having different underlying motives, 3 countries join forces to bring down an international crime organization.

programme.title: Memories Of The Sword
programme.desc: 3 warriors pledge to fight against an incompetent king. However, a betrayal occurs leading to the death of one of the warriors. 18 years later, the daughter of the betrayed sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: Friend: The Great Legacy
programme.desc: Joonsuk recruited Sunghoon, a young guy he met in prison, to help him in the gang. Little did he know Sunghoon was the son of Dongsu, whom he was suspected to kill.

programme.title: The House
programme.desc: A young couple moves back to their hometown in hopes of starting a family. But when dark memories from their past begin to surface, strange things begin to happen in their house.

programme.title: I
programme.desc: Ah-Young who grew up in an orphanage becomes the babysitter of Young-Chae, who is raising a 6-month-old child on her own. One day, her child has an accident and she places all the blame on Ah-Young...

programme.title: Actionhero
programme.desc: A college student dreaming to be an action star discovered an admission fraud. He decided to make an action film of him against the corrupted professor.

programme.title: Finding Mr. Destiny
programme.desc: Ji-woo is still hung up on a man she fell in love in her early twenties. Her worried father has no choice but to drag her to Gi-joon, who helps people to locate their long-lost first loves.

programme.title: Search Out
programme.desc: When a social media influencer finds traces of cyberbullying that led to his neighbor's suicide, he teams up with his friend to untangle the mystery behind the deadly game.

programme.title: Tunnel
programme.desc: While driving home for his daughter's birthday, a man gets trapped in a collapsed tunnel and struggles to survive with just two bottles of water, a birthday cake and a cell phone.

programme.title: My Paparotti
programme.desc: A music teacher was asked to train Jang-Ho, a teenage gangster dreamed of being a world-class singer. Yet conflict arises between two local gangs and Jang-ho was forced into a difficult situation.

programme.title: The Tenor - Lirico Spinto
programme.desc: A strong partnership and friendship begins when a talented Korean vocalist met a Japanese music producer. At the peak of his career, he was diagnosed with thyroid cancer and might loss his voice...

programme.title: The Closet
programme.desc: After losing his wife, a father tries to start over in a new home with his daughter. But things take a turn when strange noises trickle out of the closet, and his daughter goes missing.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent Jun
programme.desc: While under the influence of alcohol, an unsuccessful comic book writer draws a comic about his life as a former NIS hitman, and runs into trouble when it gets posted online.

programme.title: The Accidental Detective 2: In Action
programme.desc: A homicide detective and a comic book storekeeper recruit an online private eye to launch a full-fledged investigation on a murder case.

programme.title: The Magician
programme.desc: A talented young magician falls for a princess betrothed to his former teacher, leading to a fierce showdown between the two powerful magicians.

programme.title: Midnight
programme.desc: Kyung-mi with hearing impairment trying to save another girl from a killer becomes the prey herself. As the killer gains trust from the police, a life-threatening chase begins...

programme.title: Sympathy For Lady Vengeance
programme.desc: A woman planned revenge against her teacher after being wrongfully imprisoned for 13 years.

programme.title: 71: Into The Fire
programme.desc: 71 student-soldiers fight an impossible war against the elite 766 Commando Brigade and turn the tide of the Korean War.

programme.title: Pipeline
programme.desc: A team of experts were put together to drill into Korea’s oil pipeline and steal petroleum, but the plan takes a turn as the group begin to deceive one another…

programme.title: My Perfect Roommate
programme.desc: Living with strangers becomes even more challenging when it comes to 70-year-old lady and young college boy.

programme.title: The Battleship Island
programme.desc: During the colonial rule of Japan, around 400 Koreans are conscripted into slave labor on Hashima Island. As the island’s dark secrets are revealed, the Korean labourers plot to escape.

programme.title: 1987: When The Day Comes
programme.desc: In 1987, a pro-democracy student activist was captured and tortured to death by the police. The authorities tried to cover up the case, but the ordinary people fight to reveal the truth.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment 2: International

programme.desc: The new season of <Love Catcher> takes place in Bali! It is a dating psychological game played by 'love catchers' who participate in for searching true love and 'money catchers' who aim for money.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3370

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46084609
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10631064
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1809
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46094610
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2031
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3599
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2630
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3599
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46104611
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10671068
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2032
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-West Eyes to the East (M) (Repeat) Ep14
programme.desc: "iWalker - West Eyes to the East" followed the host, Rifat who is a foreigner that traveled abroad, leading the audience to experience Taiwan, which has never been seen before.

programme.title: Blind War
programme.desc: Former SWAT captain Dong Gu suffers traumatic visual loss during a failed mission for which he is forced to take responsibility. He manages to get over and adapt to the situation with his daughter’s company, until his nemesis appears and puts his daughter in danger. Despite being blind, Dong Gu must fight to save his daughter.

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Legend of the Demon Cat
programme.desc: Adapted from a Japanese fantasy novel, a demon cat appears and breaks the peace of Chang'an city, causing a series of mysterious events. A poet and a Japanese monk band together to follow the trails left by the cat, leading them to discover a buried secret.

programme.title: Dearest Anita
programme.desc: Based on real events, the movie follows the footsteps of the fans of Hong Kong Canto-pop diva Anita Mui. After the death of the popstar, fans from different walks of life risk arrest to track down handwritten cards, letters and other possessions from Anita Mui to preserve their idol’s memory.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: The New Big Boss
programme.desc: A young man seeks out the Wolf, a legendary undefeated warrior. When he sees that the Wolf is now an old man, he prompts him to retell his past glories.

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: Temporary Family
programme.desc: Hong Kong residential property is reported to be the most expensive in the world. Four young Hong Kong residents, each having their own issues, fall into a property speculation trap and are forced to live together in their new flat.

programme.title: Shaolin vs Evil Dead
programme.desc: Kung fu comedy meets action as the Shaolin monks, Brother White and Brother Black, take on the evil King of the Vampires and his unstoppable army of Darkness.

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: Zhongkui Kill Demon Legend
programme.desc: The Heavenly Master trapped the spirit of the Demon King so as to save the world from evil. Before he dies, the trapped spirit is transferred into Zhong Kui. As a half human and half demon, Zhong Kui is torn between good and evil. Which side will he finally choose?

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face life’s mounting hardships.

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fiancé left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: A Lifetime Treasure
programme.desc: A peaceful home for the elderly is under attack when a gangster and his cronies attempt to set up traps to take over the home! Little did they know that the five elderlies residing in the home have amazing talents to take them head on.

programme.title: The Golden Monk
programme.desc: A monk realizes he is the reincarnation of Golden Child who was cast down from heaven to experience life and death a hundred times, as he broke a sacred rule by falling in love with a fairy, Jade. While his memories are erased, Jade refuses to forget their love and accumulates goodwill over a hundred reincarnations to end Golden Child’s suffering.

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: During the time when Hong Kong was under British rule, there was a dark age when corruption and bribery were the order of the day. But in the darkness comes brave individuals who are determined to end corruption with the founding of Hong Kong's anti-corruption bureau in this star-studded crime drama that features Tony Leung Ka Fai, Anthony Wong, Eason Chan and Alex Fong.

programme.title: Bell Chamber
programme.desc: Based on a Thai ghost story of Kuman Thong, the film revolves around a woman who has caused the death of her young brother a long time ago. When she returns to the old house where they lived before, she finds herself haunted by the spirit of her young brother wanting to take revenge for his death.

programme.title: A Chinese Fairy Tale
programme.desc: Young demon hunter Yan loves the fox spirit Xiao Qian but has to rid her memories of him as a human cannot love a demon. Years later, Ning meets Xiao Qian and they fall in love. Yan advises Ning to give Xiao Qian up as she is now controlled by an evil Tree Demon but he refuses. As the Tree Demon seeks revenge, Xiao Qian also starts to remember Yan.

programme.title: Kill Mobile
programme.desc: Seven friends get together and decide to play a game where they must share all the messages, calls and app notifications on each other's cell phones. Hilarity and drama follows as everyone's secrets are unveiled throughout the evening, and the seven friends find themselves more like strangers to each other than ever before!

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb…

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: Golden Chickensss
programme.desc: Ah Kam is now a mama-san leading a team of young prostitutes to service the rich and famous, and she always aims to fulfil every client’s needs. When Ah Kam’s ex-lover, a triad boss, encounters difficulties adapting to a new Hong Kong after his release from a long imprisonment, she helps him get back on his feet to lead a normal life.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the façade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: The Trough
programme.desc: Yu Chau is a cop who has gone very deeply undercover within the triads. When he accidentally kills one of his pals in an operation, he runs off into the wild to lick his wounds. Upon his return, he teams up with fellow officers Jim and Jackie to catch a triad Boss, only to unveil collusion with government officials at the highest level.

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Queen of Triads
programme.desc: An innocent young girl named Zuo Lan attempts to commit suicide after she was betrayed by her boyfriend. However, she is saved by a gangster boss called Zui Ge. In order to exact her revenge, Zuo Lan joins force with Zui Ge and becomes a top mobster…

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Whose Baby is in the Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls’ high school, is stuck with a baby that isn’t his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: Notorious Eight
programme.desc: The young Chen Chi-chin (Liu Yung) loses heavily to experienced gambler Hu Kuan-ten (Lo Lieh). His father loses at cards and dies of shock. Chen appeals to his uncle who summons seven fellow professional gamblers to carry out vengeance. Much more than a gambling film, this is a thrilling melting pot of martial arts stars, extortion, illicit love, poker-face vengeance, and all sorts of edge-of-your-seat gambling duels. Featuring two of the leading action stars of the era, Chen Kuen-tai and Lo Lieh, in a series of intense poker game standoffs. Famed director of the genre, Wong Jing, also has a guest appearance as one of the Notorious Eight.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jin’s daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: Cat VS Rat
programme.desc: Jien Chiu and Bai Yu Tong are equally matched rivals in martial arts. Bai saves the emperor one day but did not believe his identity. Jien rescues the emperor later and gets promoted to the royal guard. This angers Bai and he attempts to jeopardize Jien’s position by stealing the imperial jade seal. Luckily, Jien is able to reclaim the seal with his skills.

programme.title: Mr Funny - bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: Ode to Gallantry
programme.desc: In this surprisingly light-hearted "Venoms" martial arts adventure, a lone wanderer is repeatedly mistaken for someone else and drawn into a number of violent battles.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insider’s look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiang’s popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: Holy Flame of the Martial World
programme.desc: This internationally popular tale of a brother and sister, seeking vengeance for the death of their parents through using the mythical yin/yang Holy Flame kung-fu technique. It's an outstanding epic choreographed and co-starring lead "Venom" Kuo Chue (aka. Philip Kwok).

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: The Lady Professional
programme.desc: Lily Ho is perfectly cast as a gun-for-hire who always gets her man - in more ways than one! The cast and crew shot on location in Japanese scenic spots such as Mount Fuji; and there are plenty of over-the-top thrills, as Lily even masquerades as a nun.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: Yu Lou is betrayed by his wife, and eventually killed by her lover, Fung, who is the boss of a martial arts school. Yu Lou’s brother Xiao Lou knows about his tragic death and is determined to take revenge on Fung and his sister-in-law.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: The Savage Five
programme.desc: A group of bandits flees with a stolen safe to a village where they oppress the villagers and force the blacksmith Wei to unlock the safe. Wei refuses and flees to report to officials, while heroes of the town emerge to fight the bandits.

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: The Flag of Iron
programme.desc: When super director Chang Cheh found new talent and blood with "The Five Venoms" actors, most of which were trained in the highly acrobatic Chinese opera and well versed with exotic martial arts weapons, this created a new spark for his use of bizarre weapons in his films. The Flag Of Iron is one of 20 movies that he directed featuring the utterly flabbergasting and physically exhausting action bits created by these five dudes. You have the good guys from the righteous clan versus the bad guys from the villainous clan and it's so filled with "don't-blink-or-you-will-miss-something" gags, you will need to watch it over and over again so you can see the things you missed.

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: Opium And The Kung-Fu Master
programme.desc: Tie Qiao San, head of the Ten Guangdong Tigers, is an honourable master with many disciples. As opium becomes popular among the nobles, Tie starts taking it and gradually harms his body. When an opium house’s owner defeats Tie in a fight and he is only saved from being killed by his disciple, Tie vows to quit opium and get back on his feet.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: Raw Courage
programme.desc: After the Ming Emperor is overthrown and his infant son was put in the care of the Black Dragon Society, a traitorous martial arts clan attacks the society, forcing an inexperienced pair of swordsman and swordswoman to flee with the infant. Their journey to deliver the infant to safety is filled with dangers that would require help from other allies…

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband’s death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: House of Traps
programme.desc: It all started with THE FIVE VENOMS, the internationally loved kung-fu thriller which introduced director Chang Cheh's recurring cast of martial arts masters. It continued through more than a dozen high-flying, bloody good entertainments featuring the same action actors in pairs, trios, quartets, and, most memorably, quintets. While this is considered the last official "Venoms" movie, what a film it is. The title does not lie: an evil prince has secreted stolen imperial treasures in a building that practically bristles with booby-trapped blades. Bodies are pierced, limbs are cut off, and there's one plasma-spurting attack after another as heroes and rogues alike try to solve the secrets of the hell house. The core Venoms themselves choreograph the gory fun in this fond farewell to their worldwide film series sensation.

programme.title: Return Of The Dead
programme.desc: A long-awaited horror sequel after Enchanted Shadow, this is about three asylum inmates telling their stories. In story one, a husband and wife discover they should be careful what they wish for. A naked female ghost seeks revenge from her watery grave in story two, and a dead prostitute returns as a ghost in the last tale.

programme.title: Purple Darts
programme.desc: A girl vows to take revenge for her parents who were murdered by four outlaws when she was only a baby. To do so, she trains hard at martial arts and teams up with a swordsman and a couple to finally kill them all.

programme.title: Illicit Desire
programme.desc: This instant cult classic adapts three erotic and mystical tales from the Chinese classical works, with stories spanning across time from the Tang to Ming dynasties. The stories, filled with characters such as emperors, concubines, monks and fortune-tellers, intertwine in a world of adultery, lust and greed, alongside great costumes!

programme.title: The Bully
programme.desc: For lovers of the Shaw's sumptuous production and martial arts expertise, this action adventure in the "Jackie Chan style" is a special treat. A persecuted waiter turns to a "drunken master" for help when a restaurant customer turns out to be a kung-fu harbinger of doom!

programme.title: Golden Swallow
programme.desc: A heroine finds herself in a love triangle with a swordsman and a warrior. They team up to conquer the evil forces of the martial arts world. However, she is caught between both men whom she admires when facing a deadly duel.

programme.title: The Deadly Duo
programme.desc: The prince of the Sung Dynasty is captured by the Chin invaders and is guarded by top martial arts masters. It is up to two powerful patriots to fight the overwhelming odds and pull off the impossible: to rescue the royal Prince and get out of the Chin stronghold alive.

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, as she is engaged to another man, they are kept apart. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: Heads For Sale
programme.desc: Hua is an upright and brave swordswoman who will stand up against villains and do anything for Luo, the man she loves. When Luo is sent to jail by the corrupted police, she sets out to free him and did not hesitate to chop off two bodyguards’ heads. In the process, she also stumbles across an old enemy of her father who is back seeking revenge.

programme.title: Return of the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: Five Superfighters
programme.desc: A kung fu master and his three students lost everything after they are floored by a bully. To take revenge, the students find ways to learn from other kung fu masters and come back six months later to have a rematch with the bully on their master’s birthday.

programme.title: The Voyage of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: Men From The Gutter
programme.desc: Two very different cops are out to capture a local drug boss. In this sizzling crime thriller, the two cops go about doing their jobs differently - one does everything to the letter of the law and the other just doing whatever it takes to solve crime.

programme.title: Young Lovers
programme.desc: Guitar-playing rich kid, Yang Fan, heads to Japan to join a rock 'n' roll band where he soon finds himself competing for the affections of two beautiful girls.

programme.title: The Imperial Swordsman
programme.desc: Fu is a government officer heading home after being charged with falsifying reports. En route, he encounters & recruits a skilled swordsman as a bodyguard. They then meet a fleeing bride and her maid who asked to join them for protection. When the group reach a ruined temple however, a gang of assassins appear and attack them…

programme.title: Arasangam
programme.desc: Tamil Mystery-Adventure Film, Starring, Vijaya Kanth, Navneet Kaur, Sheryl Pinto, Biju Menon & Rahul Dev

programme.title: Thunder
programme.desc: Tamil Action Movie, Starring, Balakrishna, Katrina Kaif, and Charmy Kaur

programme.title: Kudimagan
programme.desc: Tamil Film, Starring, Jaikumar, Master Akash, and Nanditha Jennifer

programme.title: Kabadadaari
programme.desc: Tamil Thriller Film, Starring, Sibiraj, Nandita Shwetha, Nassar, V. Jayaprakash

programme.title: Aarumugam
programme.desc: Tamil Action Movie, Starring, Bharath, Sathya, Priyamani, Ramya Krishnan, Saranya Mohan, Karunas & Others

programme.title: Krack
programme.desc: Tamil Action Thriller Movie, Starring, Ravi Teja, Shruti Haasan, Samuthirakani, and Varalaxmi Sarathkumar

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Kamali From Nadukaveri
programme.desc: Tamil Film, Starring, Anandhi, Rohit Saraf, Prathap Pothen, Imman Annachi & Others

programme.title: Asura Guru
programme.desc: Tamil Action Thriller Film, Starring, Vikram Prabhu, Mahima Nambiar, Yogi Babu, Subbaraju, Manobala & Others

programme.title: Idhu Ennoda Jilla
programme.desc: Tamil action drama movie starring Jr. NTR and Pooja Hegde. The story revolves around Veera Raghava, who loses his father to a fight with the opposition faction in the village before he can reach his hometown. Upset, Veera Raghava decides to put an end to the violence

programme.title: Kayal
programme.desc: Tamil Film, Starring, Chandran , Anandhi & others

programme.title: Ivan Kavalkaran
programme.desc: Tamil Action Movie, Starring, Bellamkonda Sai Sreenivas, Kajal Aggarwal and Mehrene Kaur Pirzada

programme.title: Oh My Kadavule
programme.desc: Tamil Fantasy Romantic Comedy Film, Starring, starring Ashok Selvan, Ritika Singh, and Vani Bhojan

programme.title: Kanaa
programme.desc: Tamil Sports Drama, Starring, Sivakarthikeyan, Aishwarya Rajesh, Blade Shankar, Sathyaraj, Fathima Samreen & Others

programme.title: Kavan
programme.desc: Tamil Action Love Movie, Starring, Vijay Sethupathi, Madonna Sebastian, T. Rajenda, Vikranth, Chandini Tamilarasan & Others

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Velan
programme.desc: Tamil Film, starring Mugen Rao, Meenakshi Govindarajan, Soori, Pazhanisamy, Maria Vincent

programme.title: Ko 2
programme.desc: Tamil Action, Thriller Movie, Starring, Bobby Simha, Prakash Raj, Nikki Galrani and Bala Saravanan

programme.title: Mannar Vagaiyara

programme.desc: Dorj and Suren’s idyllic nomadic life on the Mongolian Steppe is shaken as Suren develops complications in her pregnancy. They embark on a heartwarming journey to the capital, Ulaanbaatar, to seek medical treatment, and overcome challenges along the way.

programme.title: Forever
programme.desc: Childhood friends, Nina and Hugo chose different paths in life. Years later, Hugo returns to his hometown unbeknownst to him, the day before Nina's wedding. Events on the wedding day throw them back together and they embark on a new adventure.

programme.title: A Minute's Silence
programme.desc: In a small Baltic town, 18-year-old Christian and his teacher Stella fall for one another and begin a secret affair. However, the intensity of their feelings soon overwhelm them. When tragedy befalls Stella, Christian is forced to confront his first love.

programme.title: Dr Abel: Decomposed
programme.desc: Inspired by true stories, this thriller covers two grisly crime cases. A young waitress disappears and is held captive by a psychotic doctor. Meanwhile, the head of intelligence of Transnistria defects to the West and leaves a trail of blood behind him.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not Hate
programme.desc: Simone is an established surgeon and son of a holocaust survivor. After refusing to save a victim of a traffic accident with a swastika tattoo, he must grapple with the guilt he feels from his decision.

programme.title: Kidz
programme.desc: Sara and Nicola are married and in love. Their lives seem to be perfect: they have an angelic six-year-old daughter, thriving careers and a stable marriage. The birth of their second child, which disrupts the family balance, leads to tragicomic scenarios.

programme.title: Love And Other Accidents
programme.desc: Marie is a single mother, saddled with bank debts and running a farm. Philip, manager of the bank, goes to her farm to foreclose it but crashes his car upon arrival. Capitalising on Peter’s resultant amnesia, Marie convinces him that he is her husband.

programme.title: Picket Fences
programme.desc: Kenan, a reclusive Turkish widower, lives beside Lissi, a happy-go-lucky landlady. Both rarely see eye to eye with one another. But when Kenan’s kids embark on a mission to get their father a new woman, things take an unexpected comedic turn.

programme.title: Romancing The Jungle
programme.desc: Eva is a rookie journalist keen on investigating sea piracy. When she is really kidnapped by pirates in Thailand, she is forced to fight for her life. With her is a hunky smuggler called Nik, and together, the comedic duo band together to survive.

programme.title: The Furlough
programme.desc: Four inmates with vastly different convictions are granted a 48 hours furlough. Some seek to redeem failed relationships while others search for vengeance. But above it all, each of them seeks to reclaim their dignity and lust for life once again.

programme.title: Love In Monaco
programme.desc: Mehdi, a 30-year-old man living with his mother in the housing projects, finds himself with a tidy sum of money after winning the lottery. He decides to play high rollers in Monaco with the money, and assumes a new identity as a Moroccan prince.

programme.title: Forever
programme.desc: Childhood friends, Nina and Hugo chose different paths in life. Years later, Hugo returns to his hometown unbeknownst to him, the day before Nina's wedding. Events on the wedding day throw them back together and they embark on a new adventure.

programme.title: Dr Abel: Decomposed
programme.desc: Inspired by true stories, this thriller covers two grisly crime cases. A young waitress disappears and is held captive by a psychotic doctor. Meanwhile, the head of intelligence of Transnistria defects to the West and leaves a trail of blood behind him.

programme.title: Picket Fences

programme.title: To Live To Sing
programme.desc: Zhao Li is the manager of a small Sichuan Opera troupe. When their theater risks getting demolished, she desperately tries to find a new venue. Soon, the line between her bleak reality and the colorful fantasy of opera starts to magically blur.

programme.title: Romancing The Jungle
programme.desc: Eva is a rookie journalist keen on investigating sea piracy. When she is really kidnapped by pirates in Thailand, she is forced to fight for her life. With her is a hunky smuggler called Nik, and together, the comedic duo band together to survive.

programme.title: Dr Abel: Bruised And Battered
programme.desc: Multiple mutilated women with the words, ‘Respectez Asia’, carved on their skin, have been discovered. Coroner Dr. Abel believes that the suspect in question is innocent and strives to uncover the twisted family tragedy behind the slayings.

programme.title: The Furlough
programme.desc: Four inmates with vastly different convictions are granted a 48 hours furlough. Some seek to redeem failed relationships while others search for vengeance. But above it all, each of them seeks to reclaim their dignity and lust for life once again.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: Based on true stories retold by Palestinian refugees, this animation focuses on 11 year-old Wardi’s life in a Lebanese camp. One day, her beloved great-grandfather entrusts her with his most prized possession – the key to their ancestral house in Galilea.

programme.title: Love In Monaco
programme.desc: Mehdi, a 30-year-old man living with his mother in the housing projects, finds himself with a tidy sum of money after winning the lottery. He decides to play high rollers in Monaco with the money, and assumes a new identity as a Moroccan prince.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: When a Palestinian girl disappears, the Australian media jumps on the news like vultures. She is painted as an Islamic extremist who has joined ISIS. Her family vehemently denies the accusations as they struggle to cope with their grief and confusion.

programme.title: Arcadia
programme.desc: In this searing family drama, a family is traveling across California towards a better life. However, their mother is not with them. Through the eyes of young Greta, the heart-breaking dysfunctionality of the humble suburban family emerges.

programme.title: Lost Transport
programme.desc: Spring 1945. A train deporting hundreds of Jewish prisoners gets stranded near a small German village occupied by the Red Army. A chance encounter between German girl Winnie, Dutch Jew Simone and Russian Vera leads to an unexpected friendship.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S3 7
programme.desc: In Season Three of Superman & Lois, Clark and Lois are enjoying small town life. However, Lois' undercover assignment reveals a deadly foe that promises to change the Kent family forever.

programme.title: Stargirl S3 10
programme.desc: The team regroups after a dramatic confrontation leaves battle lines clearly drawn. A terrifying discovery made by Mike and Jakeem forces Pat and Sylvester to go on high alert.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 02
programme.desc: Leonard's job is at stake when he gives an embarrassing radio interview which angers the university and the entire physics community. NPR Host IRA FLATOW returns as himself.

programme.title: Friends S7 2
programme.desc: Joey finds out that Rachel is reading a steamy romance novel. Monica discovers that her parents have spent the money for her wedding on a beach house.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 5
programme.desc: You have the right to remain stupid! TruTV brings you 20 of the dumbest outlaws ever to fight the law and lose. This perp walk includes a drunk driving squirrel, nude news crasher, grand theft puppy, and a stick-up woman whose bra is packing. Takingthese criminals to task is our celebrity cast, including Frank Stallone, Tonya Harding, Jared Logan, and Kevin McCaffrey.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 11
programme.desc: Q, Sal, Joe and Murr act as not-so-handy-men, helping strangers assemble furniture. The guys pair up for a panty drop at the mall, and Thanksgiving comes early for the loser when he's forced to talk turkey at a dating event.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 4
programme.desc: Michael convinces car wash patrons that he broke their window, only to miraculously fix it with the push of a button. Then, dry cleaning customers are confused when Michael is suddenly wearing their clothes in the blink of an eye. Plus, he has pet store shoppers convinced that they're seeing multiple fish in an empty water bowl.

programme.desc: When an identity thief with no apparent identity of his own is found murdered in his car, the investigation leads Jane into a checkered past. CHAZZ PALMINTERI appears as Frank Sr.

programme.desc: Blood & Diamonds - After a raw diamond is found at the crime scene of a murder, Major Crimes sets up a stakeout to take down the suspected gem smugglers.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. (Season 3) Ep10
programme.desc: Monster - Hondo’s (Shemar Moore) military service comes back to haunt him when a gang of former child soldiers looks to make a fugitive Somali warlord answer for his crimes.

programme.title: FBI: International (Season 2) Ep1
programme.desc: Unburdened - The Fly Team and new Europol liaison Megan "Smitty" Garretson investigate when an American police detective on the Federal task force is murdered in Paris.

programme.title: Rookie Blue (Season 3) Ep4
programme.desc: Girl's Night Out - On Traciʼs first day as a detective, all hell breaks loose when a carload of girls from a bachelorette party hits another vehicle, killing the driver.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep14
programme.desc: The Older Brother-The Older Brothers is a gang that used to have a notorious reputation.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep18
programme.desc: I Never Sold Shower Heads for My Father-Vinnie’s father, Carmine Delpino, installs one of his famous shower heads into the Howser’s newly remodeled bathroom. In the process, Carmine grabs his chest and his breathing becomes somewhat labored.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep17
programme.desc: Where There's a Will, There's a War-B.J. goes to Seoul for a haircut and Hawkeye is sent to the front lines in his place. The fighting is so close that Hawkeye decides to write out his last will and testament. Hawkeye reminisces on the past as he names his beneficiaries at the M*A*S*H unit. Meanwhile at the 4077th, the unit has gotten word that a doctor has been killed at the front and they fear that it might be Hawkeye. The truth turns out to be that Hawkeye was actually replacing the dead surgeon and everyone is relieved to hear Hawkeye is safe.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S4 Ep16
programme.desc: One Of Our Angels Is Missing-Bondsman Harry Silvers hires the Angels to locate accused jewel thief Ray Devlin, who has fled, jumping bail. Using a cover as a wealthy divorcee, Kris is to lure Devlin from an Arizona resort back to Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Lucy Show S5 Ep10
programme.desc: Lucy, the Baby Sitter-Lucy and Mr. Mooney make a bet: if Lucy can secure other employment and las ton the job for more than one day, Mr. Mooney will rehire her at the bank at a salary increase.

programme.title: Are You Being Served? S2 Ep05
programme.desc: Hoorah for the Holidays-The staff are outraged when management insists on closing down the store for redecoration - forcing them to take annual leave when they do not want to. They protest and get a surprising offer in return.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep15
programme.desc: Once Upon A Time-After substituting for Etta Plum at Walnut Grove’s school, Laura realizes that being a housewife is not enough for her restless spirit.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep16
programme.desc: Home Again Part 1-Charles is forced to address Albert’s recent criminal behavior. The two of them take a trip back to Walnut Grove, and Charles is hopeful that the experience will straighten out his son.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Doogie's Awesome, Excellent Adventure-Doogie is jealous when Wanda and Janine fawn over Griffin Marshall, the coolest guy in school. Suddenly, Griffin passes out and goes into shock. Doogie checks his pulse and gives him a shot.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Pray Love Remember-A circular mark in mud and a large footprint are the only clues for McGarrett when a lovers quarrel has a fatal ending. John Hayes, a burly athletic-type student, is suspected of the homicide when all evidence points to him.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep17

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep01
programme.desc: Nobody's Perfect-After Dr. Koblin reports that Tabitha is a perfectly normal baby, Samantha sees a toy pony floating in the air to Tabitha when she wiggles her fingers, and realizes that the baby has inherited her witchcraft.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep02
programme.desc: The Moment of Truth-Samantha still hasn't found the courage to tell Darrin Tabitha is a witch. When the baby, using her witchcraft, turns the living room into a mess, Aunt Clara is sure her own failing powers are responsible.

programme.title: The Lucy Show S5 Ep11
programme.desc: Lucy Puts Main Street on the Map-For their help in halting a freeway from being constructed through the center of Bancroft, Lucy and her boss Mr. Mooney plan to attend a party in their honor thrown by the citizens of the small community.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep18
programme.desc: Promotion Commotion-Hawkeye, B.J. and Charles are given the assignment of deciding the promotions of the enlisted men and immediately have to fend of pleas and bribes. Charles is even threatened with violence by an ambitious Corporal Hitalski. When Klinger is promoted to Sergeant he sets up Hitalski’s arrest. Later Potter befriends a soldier who is ostracized for sticking to his moral code of ethics.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The Diamond-The IMF undertake the return of a 27,000 karat diamond to its rightful owners, the starving and deprived natives of a small country, in "The Diamond"

programme.desc: Use a Slurpy, Go to Jail-Doogie and Vinnie become hostages when a young black gang member attempts to rob the store where Vinnie works.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep04
programme.desc: Accidental Twins-Aunt Clara baby-sits with Tabitha Stephens and Timothy Tate when their parents go to the theatre. She entertains the babies with magic. Peeping through the window, Gladys Kravitz is completely befuddled.

programme.title: The Lucy Show S5 Ep12
programme.desc: Lucy Meets the Law-Lucy tosses a candy wrapper into the street and is chastised by Mary Jane. Feeling guilty, Lucy tries to retrieve the wrapper just as a red-headed female thief, being pursued by the police, slips a jewelry case into Lucy's handbag and disappears into the crowd.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep19
programme.desc: Heroes-The 4077th becomes a media circus when the middle-weight boxing champ has a stroke while at the M*A*S*H unit on a publicity junket. Hawkeye becomes the center of the media pummeling when the boxer dies while under his care. Meanwhile, B.J. invents a new medical electroshock technique while trying to save the life of a patient. The patient lives but the press ignores the story in favor of the weightier news of the death of the champ.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible S1 Ep20
programme.desc: The Legend-The IMF is assigned the task of infiltrating a clandestine meeting of top-ranking Nazis and disrupting their plans to reestablish the Third Reich in "The Legend"

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S4 Ep18
programme.desc: Homes, Sweet Homes-When a wealthy Beverly Hills couple is robbed of valuable Egyptian art treasures, the Angels suspect the dapper real estate baron, Barry Kingsbrook. Kris infiltrates the Kingsbrook Agency as an agent.

programme.title: Are You Being Served? S3 Ep02
programme.desc: Coffee Morning-Captain Peacock complains when he notices the staff are taking leisurely coffee breaks. Management then orders for a timekeeping book in which the staff will 'clock in and clock out' when they go for breaks.

programme.desc: Chucky's back! Child's Play 2 continues where the chilling original left off, with Chucky's toy company rebuilding the original doll to prove that there was nothing wrong with it. Mistake.

programme.title: The Last Of The Mohicans
programme.desc: A budding romance between a British officer's daughter and an independent man who was reared as a Mohawk complicates things for the British officer, as the adopted Mohawk pursues his own agenda despite the wrath of different people.

programme.title: Hamburger Hill
programme.desc: A brutal and realistic war film focuses on the lives of a squad of 14 U.S. Army soldiers in the battle for Hill 937 in the A Shau Valley of Vietnam.

programme.desc: The alumni cast of a cult space TV show have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help.

programme.title: The Hard Corps
programme.desc: A combat vet is hired to be a bodyguard for a former boxing champ, but complications arise when the boxer's sister falls in love with the bodyguard.

programme.title: The Net
programme.desc: A computer analyst's identity is stolen after a mysterious top-secret diskette comes into her possession.

programme.title: John Grisham's The Rainmaker
programme.desc: An idealistic young lawyer, taking on the case of an indigent family whose son is denied medical care by a powerful insurance company and dies, uncovers a multi-billion dollar insurance scam.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The alumni cast of a cult space TV show have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help.

programme.title: Her Deadly Boyfriend
programme.desc: After breaking up with her perfect-on-paper boyfriend, Sadie is swept off her feet by the rebellious bad boy Gavin. But soon, she discovers dating a bad boy isn’t just exciting... it’s dangerous.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: Sequel to the blockbuster hit, the smart-talking Detroit cop shows the Beverly Hills force how to run business in an attempt to save his friend from an unjust dismissal.

programme.title: Flatliners
programme.desc: A group of medical students are about to die . . . and live to tell about it.

programme.title: The Contractor

programme.title: Bad Country
programme.desc: Bad Country concerns a veteran Baton Rouge detective who infiltrates the most powerful criminal enterprise in the South and after taking down its top lieutenant and contract killer, convinces him to turn informant to help bring down the entire organization.

programme.title: A Single Shot
programme.desc: A single shot, aimed at a lone deer, hits and kills a young woman. Hunter John Moon watches the young woman die before discovering a box of money near her body. In a desperate panic, he takes the cash and attempts to cover up the killing.

programme.title: Climate Change - The Facts
programme.desc: After one of the hottest years on record, Sir David Attenborough looks at the science of climate change and potential solutions to this global threat.

programme.title: Extinction - The Facts (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough focuses on endangered species and the fast-looming extinction crisis that so many animals have fallen victim to.

programme.title: Zoo Quest in Colour (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Part 1 - During the 1950s a young Sir David Attenborough and a team from London Zoo worked to conserve rare and exotic animals by bringing them to the UK. Part 1/2.

programme.title: Zoo Quest in Colour (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Part 2 - During the 1950s a young Sir David Attenborough and a team from London Zoo worked to conserve rare and exotic animals by bringing them to the UK. Part 2/2.

programme.title: Attenborough at 90 (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: As he approaches his 90th birthday, Sir David Attenborough discusses his pioneering work on the natural history programmes that have inspired, entertained and educated millions of people for decades.

programme.title: Food Factory (S4) Ep23
programme.desc: This episode looks at how chocolate chips, Bombay mix, pickle slices and mushroom soup are made on a large scale.

programme.title: Food Factory (S4) Ep24
programme.desc: This episode looks at how squeezable yoghurt tubes, tomato sauce, fruity chews and tempeh are made on a large scale.

programme.title: Martin Clunes: Islands of the Pacific (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: South West Pacific - Martin climbs an active volcano in Vanuatu, and in Tonga meets a third gender leiti and a princess. In Fiji he visits a tribe tricked out of their homeland by a British mining company.

programme.title: Turkey with Simon Reeve (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Taurus Mountains to Istanbul - In the Taurus Mountains, Simon stays with descendants of the original Turks, nomads known as Yoruks, whose lifestyle is under threat from the modern world and an increasingly Islamic government.

programme.title: Food Factory (S4) Ep25
programme.desc: This episode looks at how packaged rice, Caesar salad, apple pies and gluten-free multi-grain English muffins are made on a large scale.

programme.title: Food Factory (S4) Ep26
programme.desc: This episode looks at how hot sauce, 'Shredded Wheat', coffee-chocolate bars and hard-boiled eggs are made on a large scale.

programme.title: Animal Einsteins (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Social Networkers - Chris looks at social intelligence in the animal kingdom and finds out why it is that, for animals, being together means being clever.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Hong Kong - Michael begins his adventures in Hong Kong, with railway highlights including the cable funicular to the top of Hong Kong's highest mountain, the Peak, and the enviably efficient and shiny Mass Transit System.

programme.title: Life Below Zero (S10) Ep13
programme.desc: Break Up Time is Wake Up Time - Our Alaskans emerge from a long winter and seize new opportunities to travel, hunt, and farm while facing the dangers from thawing rivers.

programme.desc: Florida - Over in the United States, Robson heads to sea to catch bull shark, blue tilapia, remora and many other fish.

programme.title: Food Factory (S5) Ep1
programme.desc: An all-American candy company makes 200,000 packages of red licorice every day; a zippy mayonnaise packs the punch of spicy Sriracha; 40,000 Turkish bourekas are produced every day; and Laceys feature a chocolate centre sandwiched between two wafer-thin cookies.

programme.title: Food Factory (S5) Ep2
programme.desc: 1.8 million cherry chews are produced from just one single batch; massive silos of wheat are transformed into 'elbow' macaroni pasta; a continental cranberry cheesecake first started as a Christmas experiment; and meet chakri, the exotic southeast Asian snack that's hand-twirled and fried to crispy perfection.

programme.title: The Age of Nature (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Awakening - Discover how a new awareness of nature is helping to restore ecosystems across the globe, with inventive actions being taken to repair manmade damage and restore reefs, rivers and animal populations.

programme.title: Australia with Simon Reeve (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Simon joins an Aussie rancher to round up camels using a specially-adapted off road vehicle and a chopper.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle (S9) Ep9
programme.desc: Uruguay - Ben Fogle meets Rhona Mitra who has swapped her home in Hollywood for a remote farmhouse in Uruguay.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green (S3) Ep12
programme.desc: California - Robson ends his world tour with a trip to California where he pits his wits against the Blue Shark, the Humboldt squid and the rainbow trout.

programme.desc: Simon joins an Aussie rancher to round up camels using a specially-adapted off road vehicle and a chopper.

programme.title: Food Factory (S5) Ep3
programme.desc: Meet the worker bees who transform raw honey into liquid gold; a California bakery turns out 50,000 loaves of sprouted wheatbread; meet the cookie doctor behind a unique checkerboard creation; and it takes a team of experts to produce irresistible chocolate-covered cherries.

programme.title: Food Factory (S5) Ep4
programme.desc: A humble sunflower seed is at the heart of every rainbow-coloured Sunburst candy; a rice vinegar packs a karate kick of flavour; get a tangy taste of Thailand without leaving home; and thousands of bees are behind gourmet caramels.

programme.title: The Hunt (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: Race Against Time - The coast can be a rich hunting ground, but opportunities never last long so hunters are always in a race against time.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Hidden Caribbean: Havana to Haiti (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Haiti - Before leaving Cuba, Joanna gets as close as possible to Guantanamo Bay, before taking a short boat trip to Haiti, a nation born from slave revolution with a strong tradition of voodoo.

programme.title: Australia's Health Revolution with Michael Mosley (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Dr. Mosley meets with eight Australians diagnosed with type 2 diabetes or pre-diabetes who dream of getting their health back and turning their lives around. Together with Ray, Dr. Mosley will guide the participants through drastic diet and lifestyle adjustments.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green (S4) Ep1
programme.desc: Ascension Island - Robson's journey begins on Ascension Island, a tiny outpost with underfished waters in the middle of the Atlantic Ocean.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Busy Bay - Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Collisions - Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Monkey Madness - Amanda puts a radio collar on one of the first cheetah cubs born in Malawi in twenty years and the team struggles to give a 4-meter python a physical. See a group of tourists deliver a rambunctious baby monkey they rescued from the pet trade.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rebuilding an Empire - Over the course of recorded time, many species have been threatened with extinction. Once-powerful animal empires – like the dinosaurs - have been completely wiped from the planet. But others once on the verge of disappearance have survived, bounced back, and even reclaimed their kingdoms.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Animals Gone Wild - As the popular characters of songs and stories, farm animals are celebrated all over the world. But few stories tell of their sister species who live in the wild. These animals known primarily as livestock, beasts of burden, or even pets must fend for themselves beyond the fences of their domesticated kin.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Tricksters - The animal kingdom is filled with mimicry, transformation, and trickery. Discover how stick bugs, lion fish, emperor scorpions, and chameleons use camouflage and confusion to deceive.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Wild Stallions of the Himalayas - The high altitude Ladakh plateau in northwest India is a land of extremes. The air is thin and the mountain landscape treacherous; winters are freezing, while summers are scorching hot. The Tibetan wild ass is king of these grasslands, and one old stallion has developed a way to stay one step ahead of his rivals. We follow Dorje as he shadows a herd of females and foals, from winter to summer, when he will get his chance to sire the next generation. But to win his prize he must eventually do battle with other stallions - all wanting his crown!

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 Ep6
programme.desc: African Myths - Africa is a continent filled with unique and extraordinary creatures whose lives are shaped by millions of years of evolution. Africa is also the birthplace of humankind. We traveled alongside the continent's animals on our own journey of evolution, yet intelligence took us on a very different path. Our curiosity led to questions about the world around us which were answered through stories, myths and legends.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Home Away from Home - Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Busy Bay - Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Dino - T-Rex and chickens seem to be as different as they can be, but they more in common that you might think. Recent research reveals that some of our favorite dinosaurs were very birdlike, and that birds are an extant kind of dinosaurs.

programme.desc: Home Away from Home - Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Busy Bay - Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Collisions - Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Monkey Madness - Amanda puts a radio collar on one of the first cheetah cubs born in Malawi in twenty years and the team struggles to give a 4-meter python a physical. See a group of tourists deliver a rambunctious baby monkey they rescued from the pet trade.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rebuilding an Empire - Over the course of recorded time, many species have been threatened with extinction. Once-powerful animal empires – like the dinosaurs - have been completely wiped from the planet. But others once on the verge of disappearance have survived, bounced back, and even reclaimed their kingdoms.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Animals Gone Wild - As the popular characters of songs and stories, farm animals are celebrated all over the world. But few stories tell of their sister species who live in the wild. These animals known primarily as livestock, beasts of burden, or even pets must fend for themselves beyond the fences of their domesticated kin.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Head & Neck - Have you ever wondered why mandrills have such colorful faces, why vultures are bald, or even why hammerheads have, well, hammer-shaped heads? Discover how animals managed to survive by evolving from the neck up.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Human Influenced - In geological and biological scales, humans have only been around for the blink of an eye, and yet we’ve managed to influence the evolutionary path for many animals. Explore the human impact on dogs, wolves, coyotes, elephants, and more.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 Ep4
programme.desc: A Sloth Bear's Dilemma - In a land of searing summer heat and thunderous tropical storms, life for all that live on the plains of southern India is tough. But this year it’s harder than ever as the monsoon rains are late to arrive. For Bibi, a female sloth bear with two young cubs, this will be the biggest challenge of her life. With no rainfall, food will be hard to find and her cubs are also open to attack from leopards and other bears. Bibi must guide her family through this tricky time. Does she have the experience for them all to survive?

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 Ep7
programme.desc: Chilema and Her Brother - Chilema is an Elephant with half a trunk; losing the tip to a poacher's snare. It was intended to catch antelope for bushmeat. But the snare's indiscriminate nature means other animals often fall foul of them, with devastating results. Chilema is now having to adapt to life without an elephants most important appendage. She must learn how to eat, drink and also take a mud bath to ensure her survival. With the added challenge of the harsh dry season, Chilema is fighting against the odds to survive.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Connections - Follow scientists and Traditional Owners as they map out ecological links, migratory pathways, and interspecies bonds that conserve Ningaloo’s biodiversity. Frolic with whales, float among seaweed islands, and see archaeologists nix a settler myth.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Great Escape - Watch as the Lilongwe Wildlife team try to release two serval cats into the wild. One escapes and returns injured. Will their release be successful? A new baby vervet arrives in critical condition, and a giant owl flies to freedom.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep2
