programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Dragon Mountain: Surviving the Summit - South Africa's Drakensberg is one of the continent's most impressive landscapes. It is home to sharp climatic and ecological gradients as physical conditions change for both land-based creatures and the Raptors that swirl in the skies above.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lake Manyara National Park - In north Tanzania, towering mountains line a dramatic valley. Enriched by ancient volcanoes, its slopes provide a variety of habitats for life to thrive and its great centerpiece holds water through even the driest of times.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 Ep1

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lake Manyara National Park - In north Tanzania, towering mountains line a dramatic valley. Enriched by ancient volcanoes, its slopes provide a variety of habitats for life to thrive and its great centerpiece holds water through even the driest of times.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Interior - Some of the most interesting adaptations in the animal world are completely invisible. Study these hidden, internal alterations to see how different animals have evolved to survive in amazing and unseen ways.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Eyes - Why do zebras have stripes? How do penguins see underwater? And why are a tree frog’s eyes red? In this exploration of sight, discover how some animals have evolved to see extremely well while others have evolved to be nearly invisible.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Rana: Queen of the Jungle - One of the most iconic animals on Earth stalks the jungles of India: the Bengal Tiger. Over the course of a single day, we follow the fortunes of one mother and her three young cubs. She must provide enough food for her family to stay alive.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 Ep8
programme.desc: Tree Tales - Trees are Africa’s oldest residents, and each has its own strategy for surviving the dry season. The sausage tree and the fig tree ride-out seasonal extremes, to provide food and shelter for struggling animals in the lean times. In return animals help these trees to reproduce by pollinating their flowers and dispersing their seed. African trees promote life, and form the backbone of one of Earths’ most precious ecosystems.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Choices - Learn how Ningaloo’s conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Big Buck Chase - Join Amanda on a white knuckle bush-whacking adventure to rescue a waterbuck caught by a poacher's snare. Meanwhile, the center's resident hyena is treated for flea bitten ears and Alma gets a mysterious late night monkey delivery.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Dragon Mountain: Surviving the Summit - South Africa's Drakensberg is one of the continent's most impressive landscapes. It is home to sharp climatic and ecological gradients as physical conditions change for both land-based creatures and the Raptors that swirl in the skies above.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Monterey Bay Marine Sanctuary - On the West Coast of the United States, the Monterey Bay National Marine Sanctuary is the largest marine sanctuary in the country - home to 525 species of fish, and a massive, underwater Kelp forest.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Mesoamerican Reef - The Mesoamerican Reef is a pristine ocean ecosystem- but after decades of overfishing and tourist activity, much of this reef is in jeopardy. These Parks are monitored by Ocean advocates dedicated to maintaining the shark feeding grounds, turtle populations and marine spawning grounds that line this incredible reef system.

programme.title: Donal's Family Kitchen (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: Donal Skehan prepares Sunday Comfort food. The Sunday slump can be a struggle and these recipes are the ultimate comforting meals for nights like these.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA (S10) Ep9
programme.desc: Mayor of Shreveport - Adrian Perkins, Mayor of Shreveport, La., feels the heat undercover as he faces literal fires and hard truths while being trained by city employees within the fire and police departments, the park maintenance team, and at a youth recreation center.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off (S7) Ep12
programme.desc: It's day two of Finals Week and the bakers take on a Junior Bake Off first... Super Snack Day. They make an ultimate sandwich and giant versions of their favourite sweet delights.

programme.title: Grand Designs (S20) Ep8
programme.desc: In 2011, Edward and Hazel set out to build a lighthouse on the north Devon coast. By 2019, they were near bankruptcy with just a rusting shell.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo: My Swedish Kitchen (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Swedish House Man's Food - Rachel makes a wonderful dish with butternut squash waffles, and a mixed cherry tomato salad with crispy bacon. She picks kale from the west coast of Sweden, and sees a large-scale tomato farm.

programme.title: The Hairy Bikers' Chocolate Challenge (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: The hopefuls go supersize in the first round, before trying to wow with a grab-bag of morsels, from boozy bubbles to amaretto waves.

programme.title: Bake Off - The Professionals (S4) Ep7
programme.desc: Almond Pithiviers, Savoury Brioche and a Sugar Showpiece - The three best teams from both sets of heats face new rivals as they create classic almond pithiviers and individual savoury brioche, before making a striking sugar showpiece.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA (S10) Ep9
programme.desc: Mayor of Shreveport - Adrian Perkins, Mayor of Shreveport, La., feels the heat undercover as he faces literal fires and hard truths while being trained by city employees within the fire and police departments, the park maintenance team, and at a youth recreation center.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off (S7) Ep13
programme.desc: It's Magical Day and the bakers conjure up fantastical bakes, as sponge takes on a double meaning and the bakers' sorcery skills are tested when icing is let loose during judging.

programme.title: Gino's Italian Family Adventure (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Mia in Northern Sardinia - Gino and daughter Mia head to Gallura in northern Sardinia to discover local traditions and recipes handed down through the generations.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Together (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Curry Night - Jamie creates a vegetarian feast with an array of fragrant dishes, including a coconut squash curry, beautifully fried golden paneer and a smoky aubergine dal, finished off with minted mango fro-yos.

programme.desc: Black Forest Gateaux, Roulades and Sugar Chocolate Showpieces - It's the quarter-final and the teams make Black Forest gateaux and mini roulades, before going back to the 70s as they create disco-inspired sugar chocolate showpiece desserts.

programme.desc: In Suffolk, Emma and Nick help Pete and Louise who are struggling to work from home and deal with the needs of their two kids. Can the team create some much-needed individual space for the family?

programme.title: Junior Bake Off (S7) Ep14
programme.desc: It's the semi-final and things get fruity. The bakers go up against the clock to set layers of jelly and fruit before building magnificent meringue towers celebrating fresh fruit.

programme.title: Donal's Asian Baking Adventure (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Hong Kong 2 - Donal visits Mong Kok Market, where Moon cakes and Wife cakes are much-loved local delicacies, both a nod to Hong Kong's Chinese roots. The city was under British rule for 99 years ending in 1997 and nowadays there's a growing appetite for nostalgia.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat (S2) Ep3
programme.desc: Bristol - Michel Roux Jr takes Fred to his favourite British city, Bristol, for a Christmas treat: from the perfect French bistro to a festive countryside escape and Jamaican jerk turkey.

programme.title: Bake Off - The Professionals (S4) Ep9
programme.desc: The Semi-Final - The semi-finalists must bake batches of perfect petit fours, and create a magical, teddy bear's picnic-inspired table scene with hidden desserts, for a place in the final.

programme.title: Grand Designs (S20) Ep9
programme.desc: In 2015, Vicky and Ed set out to transform a derelict cowshed into a 21st-century smallholding in Somerset. Six years on, how much has this wildly ambitious project changed their lives?

programme.desc: Hong Kong 2 - Donal visits Mong Kok Market, where Moon cakes and Wife cakes are much-loved local delicacies, both a nod to Hong Kong's Chinese roots. The city was under British rule for 99 years ending in 1997 and nowadays there's a growing appetite for nostalgia.

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2018
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2018 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep28
programme.desc: Switched! / Free Range Chickens - Archibald and Cheryl accidentally swap bodies. They must each go through the other’s daily routine, with Archibald pretending to be Cheryl and vice versa, until they can undo the mix up. / When the Strutters go camping, they find a tribe of primitive cave chickens. After Archibald gives them a parting gift, he unknowingly changes their course in history.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep27
programme.desc: It Takes Ahhh Valley Part 1 & 2 - When the Croods return to Ahhh! Valley they find that the evil Brood family has taken over and Grug must work with fellow Valleyites to defeat them

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep26
programme.desc: Lucky And Her New Family Part 2 - With El Circo Dos Grillos in town, memories of Milagro prompt big changes for Lucky and Jim.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep26
programme.desc: That Thing You Dot / Where the Streets Have No Games - When Chevron bosses around everyone in her band, Dot decide to form her own band. The Harvey Street Kids become obsessed with a new video game.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep26
programme.desc: Tur-Bros / The Snailman - During a visit to a racing convention Turbo is kidnapped by an overzealous fan and it's up to the rest of the FAST crew to save him. // Turbo throws a wild race for his fellow insects, but is surprised when his old nemesis, Guy Gagne, returns for a rematch.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep6
programme.desc: Lula's Last Stand / Triple Trouble - Little Lula has set up a lemonade stand, but she’s not getting any business. The Zenkos swing into action to send customers her way. / When Donna, Fawna and Rona have a spat, the triplets’ longstanding annual tradition of viewing a comet together is in jeopardy. Now it’s up to Team Zenko to get the three feuding sisters back together again before the comet streaks by.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep28
programme.desc: Switched! / Free Range Chickens - Archibald and Cheryl accidentally swap bodies. They must each go through the other’s daily routine, with Archibald pretending to be Cheryl and vice versa, until they can undo the mix up. / When the Strutters go camping, they find a tribe of primitive cave chickens. After Archibald gives them a parting gift, he unknowingly changes their course in history.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep36
programme.desc: Chummy Sparklestone / Giggleyum - When the Funtime Factory stops producing one of their frosting flavors, Poppy sets out to create a replacement. But is her new flavor, Giggleyum too delicious?/During a Troll mystery party, Cooper has the role of detective. But when the party is over, Detective Cooper – now “Chummy Sparklestone” – refuses to break character, and he’s causing problems around the village!

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep16
programme.desc: Shiny Leaf/Roundy - Leaf freaks out when he finds a blemish on his butt before a body building competition and Twig tries desperately to snap him out of his existential crisis. / Berry gets jealous when Rocksy starts spending all of her time with a marble, and tries various attempts to make the marble "disappear."

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep36
programme.desc: Pirate Booty - After pirates invade San Lorenzo searching for mystical treasure, Puss leads them on the hunt, hoping his share will defend against the Bloodwolf

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep26
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part II - Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants’ brain and defeat the nanobots’ leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep27
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Worrisome Wedge of the Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep71
programme.desc: Mi Amore Wing - Following the announcement of Dagur and Malas engagement Astrid questions her relationship with Hiccup. In the meantime the Riders battle Krogan over an unexpectedly placed lens

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep72
programme.desc: Ruff Transition - A baby Razorwhip bonds with Ruffnut forcing her to become a Wingmaiden but when she doesnt have the maternal instincts she must figure out how to protect the baby dragon when the Flyers attack

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep21
programme.desc: Plushythingy - When Frederic Estes creates the cutest plushy ever that is the hottest toy in town, the field team must destroy the last remaining one but are powerless against its cuteness

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep23
programme.desc: Picture Perfect - Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep19
programme.desc: The Battle(s) of Gongmen Bay - Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep20
programme.desc: Gongmen City Hustle - Po and the Kids make it to Gongmen City in search of the contact they heard has some info on the dirigible crash. Meanwhile, Xiao, mourning the presumed death of her new panda friends, takes off into the woods and meets a new friend.

programme.desc: Gongmen City Hustle - Po and the Kids make it to Gongmen City in search of the contact they heard has some info on the dirigible crash. Meanwhile, Xiao, mourning the presumed death of her new panda friends, takes off into the woods and meets a new friend.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep36
programme.desc: Chummy Sparklestone / Giggleyum - When the Funtime Factory stops producing one of their frosting flavors, Poppy sets out to create a replacement. But is her new flavor, Giggleyum too delicious?/During a Troll mystery party, Cooper has the role of detective. But when the party is over, Detective Cooper – now “Chummy Sparklestone” – refuses to break character, and he’s causing problems around the village!

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep16
programme.desc: Shiny Leaf/Roundy - Leaf freaks out when he finds a blemish on his butt before a body building competition and Twig tries desperately to snap him out of his existential crisis. / Berry gets jealous when Rocksy starts spending all of her time with a marble, and tries various attempts to make the marble "disappear."

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep36
programme.desc: Pirate Booty - After pirates invade San Lorenzo searching for mystical treasure, Puss leads them on the hunt, hoping his share will defend against the Bloodwolf

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep37
programme.desc: The Case Of The Pocket's Present - Fuse asks Noddy to take a present to the Pockets. But when Noddy arrives at the Treehouse, he discovers he's carrying an empty box. The present, whatever it was, has gone! Noddy must investigate: where is the Pockets' present? But how will he ever find it when he doesn't actually know what it is? It's going to take all his detecting skills to solve this one!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep38
programme.desc: The Case Of Fuse's New Game - When Fuse invites his friends to come for a playdate all they want to do is play his new computer game. But then suddenly the computer goes off. He soon discovers there's a power cut affecting the whole of Brickabuild. But who switched off the power? And why? Desperate to carry on with the game, Noddy decides to investigate: how can they play Fuse's new game?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep39
programme.desc: The Case of the Pirate's Treasure - Queen Sparklewings asks the Pirate Captain to do the first dance with her at the Queen's Dance. But when it's time to practise, the Captain can't come: someone's stolen their treasure! Noddy decides to help find the treasure so the Captain will still be able to dance. He needs to investigate: Who stole the Pirates' treasure?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep40
programme.desc: The Case Of The Empty Store - Clockwork Mouse leaves Carlton in charge of getting everything ready for the Builders' Parade. Carlton gratefully accepts Noddy's offer of help but doesn't want the Naughticorns helping too! But when Carlton goes to the Brickabuild Store for supplies, he's horrified to discover the store is empty. How will they get the parade ready now? And will Clockwork Mouse ever trust Carlton again? Noddy sets out to investigate: Who took all the stuff from the Brickabuild Store?

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion Ep11
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Noisy Mystery - Raa Raa and his friends hear a strange noise and find a set of tracks in the Jungle but what could be making them

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion Ep12
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Coolest Hello - Raa Raa and his friends come up with lots of different ways to say hello to make one cool greeting.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion Ep13
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Bell Flowers - Raa Raa is waiting for the beautiful Bell Flowers to open but can the fidgety lion sit still long enough to see one

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion Ep14
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Funniest Laugh - Raa Raa and his friends try to find things that make funny noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep37
programme.desc: High-Tech Overload - Big Chris has got a new gadget to monitor the cars. He puts it to the test, what could possibly go wrong?!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep38
programme.desc: Workshop Chaos - Big Chris is furious when Marsha tidies up his workshop - how's he supposed to work in these conditions? Luckily Flash saves helps out by messing it up again!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep39
programme.desc: Silver Hatch Shapes Up - Conrod is having an engine tune up at Silver Hatch. He boasts that his spoilers make him faster than all the other cars… who then want to be just as fast as their V8 hero…

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep40
programme.desc: Pit Stop Perils - Mr Carburettor is fed up with Roary and Maxi constantly bickering about who is the fastest car at Silver Hatch. He decrees that the pair will have a race, and whoever wins, is the fastest - no more arguing!

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep19
programme.desc: Ring My Bell / First Mate Casper - Ring My Bell When Casper encourages Quasi to go on strike from his thankless job as chore boy, Alder and Dash make Casper take his place. First Mate Casper When Cappy needs a first mate, Casper's the only one who's up to the challenge.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep20
programme.desc: Power Outage Part 1 + 2 - Power Outage – Part 1: A Powerful Foe When Scare School falls victim to the Baccora, Kibosh encourages the students to work together, setting booby-traps and building defences. Power Outage – Part 2: Razznik's Revenge Creature by creature, the evil entity, Baccora, robs Scare School of its powers and locks them into a magical cleptor.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep8
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Jarring Jerkiness of the Judge J.O.R.T.S - George and Harold transform their new Spanish teacher into a superhero after they feel guilty for pranking him, but their teacher loves it and gets carried away

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep5
programme.desc: Monster Machine - The annual baby pageant approaches, but Staci’s plan to win may have a negative effect

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep6
programme.desc: The Constipation Situation - Boss Baby struggles to take a sick day even though a mysterious baby cry is wreaking havoc on the neighborhood baby-love

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep27
programme.desc: Bootless Cries - After Puss decides everything bad happening in town is his fault and pursues a new career, the Mole King invades San Lorenzo and changes everything

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep27
programme.desc: Wormhole / Ear Worm - Following the events of the “Branch Bum,” the Trolls become lost in a series of wormholes, each of which leads to a new and strange alternate world. The Snack Pack must work together in order to find their way back home/In order to psych the Snack Pack up for collecting the confetti from Confetti-fest, DJ Suki unveils the catchiest song ever written. But when the song proves a little too catchy, Poppy will do anything to help get the song out of her friends’ heads.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep27
programme.desc: O Captain, My Captain Part 1 - Prince Barty and Princess Julienne, King Julien's needy and dramatic parents, must take over for their son when he's held captive on a pirate ship

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep1
programme.desc: Lucky And The Unbreakable Spirit - A wild horse Spirit and a soontobe city girl Lucky become friends in a frontier town

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep27
programme.desc: Big in Japan - Wally and Wenda travel to Tokyo for a Manga festival and meet up with Koichi, fellow Wanderer and Go Hero Go fan. But when Fritz is accidentally zapped by the Mega Mega Monster key, he grows to the size of Godzilla and tries to eat all the noodles in the city. The wanderers must stop him and get the key back.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep7
programme.desc: Ding Dong Day \ Grand Sam - It’s Pawston’s annual Take Your Kid to Work Day, and it’s Tag’s year to spend the day at the Doorbell Store with Paw. \ Sam Whippet challenges the Not Yet Cadets to complete an obstacle course in the woods.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep7
programme.desc: Pet Project / Mission Improbable - When Mr. Tanaka adopts an unruly dog at Sam’s behest, the Zenkos have the job of training the mischievous mutt and turning him into man’s best friend material. / When Ellie's friend Maria is late submitting her painting to the art show, it’s up to the Zenkos to get inside the community center after hours, avoiding overzealous junior security Rodney, and get Maria’s painting on display before the show starts.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep7
programme.desc: Sick Day - When the other dragons come down with the flu, Summer must overcome her fear of eels to retrieve the cure and get her friends back in the air.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep13
programme.desc: The Case Of The Sticky Putty - Something very strange is happening in Brickabuild. Clockwork Mouse is giving all sorts of confusing orders to the builders and everything is chaos. Noddy realises that someone has put sticky putty on her clockwork key and it's making her run slowly. Noddy decides to investigate and find out who could have tried to damage the little mouse. Following all the clues and keeping track of all the evidence in his WhoWhatWhere Tablet, Noddy finds that the trail leads him to Carlton! But Carlton adores Clockwork Mouse! Noddy discovers that poor Carlton didn't meant to damage her; he just wanted to help her rest and not work so hard. Noddy has a brilliant idea. If Clockwork Mouse and Carlton work together, they can get all their jobs finished in half the time. And then there'll be plenty of time to rest – and play! Good idea Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep14
programme.desc: The Case Of The Toyland Accidents - Something strange is happening in Toyland – trees are falling down and machines are going crazy. What's going on? Noddy needs to use all his investigating skills to find out who is causing all the accidents before someone gets hurt. He realises that Deltoid is trying to help and be a superhero but hasn't realised that his superstrength is causing chaos! Noddy shows him how to be a super helpful superhero without causing anymore accidents! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep29
programme.desc: The Fluffberg Method / Singing Tele-Grammers - When Dr. Fluffberg is outed as not being a real doctor, Archibald must help him through medical school where students are put through the trials of a simulated hospital. / Archibald dons the mantle of a singing telegrammer but runs into trouble when he loses the official “Grammer” songbook.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep28
programme.desc: Deus Ex Monkhuaha / Slak Attack - Sandy becomes jealous when the family gets an adorable monkhuahua/Eep and Thunk act like lazy “slaks” instead of doing their schoolwork and chores

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep1
programme.desc: Lucky And The Unbreakable Spirit - A wild horse Spirit and a soontobe city girl Lucky become friends in a frontier town

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep27
programme.desc: Get Rich Quick / Noogie Nights - Richie Rich visits Harvey Street to shut down a game gone rogue. Lessons learned at a murder mystery party help Richie make his first real friends.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep27
programme.desc: The Challenge/Home On Our Own - Chet challenges the crew see who can hold out the longest without racing; Trouble knocks at the clubhouse door when Clip and Clap seek revenge.

programme.desc: Glamping / A Flower for Poppy - Branch is excited to take the Troll children camping with him. But when Guy Diamond arrives at the camp site with “glamping” gear, the kids decide they prefer Guy’s plush method of camping to Branch’s insistence on roughing it./Poppy’s the most amazing gift-giver in Troll Village, and the Snack Pack are determined to finally gift her something as good as her birthday. So when Poppy off-handedly mentions her favorite rare flower, her friends set out to find it for her- but who will get to gift it?

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep17
programme.desc: The Great Grape Rescue/Sneezyitis - The Mighty Ones meet a courageous grape who inspires them to try to rescue his whole bunch. / When the Mighty Ones, except for Rocksy, all mysteriously get sick at the same time, they begin to fear that they have become allergic to Rocksy and go to great lengths to stay together...apart.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep37
programme.desc: Cat Fish - When pirates force Puss to face his fear of water by walking the ship's plank, he is rescued by his ex-girlfriend and fish monster, Feejee the Mermaid.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep41
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Players - It's time for the Toyland football match but the game can't go ahead until Noddy finds the missing players. Noddy discovers that someone misdirected Pat Pat and Deltoid so that they'd miss the match. Noddy finds the missing players and reunites everyone at the real football pitch but then Hoof disappears. Noddy discovers that Hoof misdirected the others because he wanted to be the best player. Hoof learns that football is a team sport where all the team members need to work together to make it the best game ever. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep42
programme.desc: The Case Of The Changed Basketball Hoop - Noddy's about to play a game of basketball with Big Ears and Deltoid when he realizes that the hoop has been fiddled with. Who could've done that and why? Noddy's investigation leads him to Fuse, who explains that he just wanted to help the toys that weren't as skilled as him. Everyone practises and realises that the best way to improve at sport is to keep practising. Well done Noddy.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep43
programme.desc: The Case Of The Ruined Crops - Farmer Tom is confused and upset when he finds all his trees and corn knocked over. Noddy decides to investigate: who spoiled Farmer Tom's crops? He soon discovers lots of strange heavy bags scattered all over the farm. Whose are they? Where did they come from? And what could they possibly have to do with Smartysaurus's new hot air balloon?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep44
programme.desc: The Case Of The Broken Pulley - The Head Builder isn't happy. Someone's been playing with the builders' stuff and now their pulley doesn't work. Noddy decides he needs to find out who did it before anything else goes wrong. Who broke the Builders' pulley?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep221
programme.desc: Tiny Creatures - Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pig's garden when they find a little snail. Then Grandpa also shows them his beehive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep222
programme.desc: The Sports Day - It is Sports Day at Peppa’s playgroup. There are lots of exciting events, including running, jumping and the “tug of war”. Daddy Pig tells Peppa that it’s not the winning that matters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep223
programme.desc: GrandDad Dog's Garage - Peppa’s car runs out of petrol but thankfully Granddad Dog’s garage isn’t far away. With one phone call, Granddad Dog is on his way. He tows Peppa’s car back to his garage.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep119
programme.desc: The Collection - Upon seeing Ron's stick collection, Froga learns for the first time what "a collection" is. Anna would like to create one of her own. The others have all one sticks, bubbles, sounds, tools. They help Anna to find her memories with her friends

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Fixing Things - Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep312
programme.desc: Something New at Blue's School - Join Josh and Blue at school for a day of trying new things! Josh is excited to try being Teacher for the Day, but Blue seems nervous to try something. What could it be?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep805
programme.desc: Pups Save The Mustache / Pups Save the Funhouse - The Pups must help to find Mayor Humdinger's mustache after he accidentally shaves it off before it's about to be on the cover of a magazine. // When a carnival train gets stuck in a tunnel, it results in a mountainside funhouse-style wild ride.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep203
programme.desc: Pups Save Jake - Jake and Chase go deep cave spelunking when Jake ends up getting his ankle stuck between some fallen rocks!

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Lola's Air Display / Down The Sewers - Lola is worried her air display will not be impressive enough, but when Sir Steel joins, the air display goes wrong in a spectacular way! // When Sir Steel's dog Muffin's ball goes missing down the sewers, Bobbi has to face his fear of the dark.

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep215
programme.desc: Treasure Park/Baddy Long Legs - When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting! // Rammy is so focused on meditation that he fails to focus on a REAL crisis!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Paddington and the Bone / Paddington Joins a Band - Mr. Gruber has been loaned a T-Rex Skeleton, but Lucky the dog has stolen the priceless bone and buried it somewhere. // The kids decide to form a rock band with Paddington, but what instrument should he play, and what is rock music?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Guacamole - Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep115
programme.desc: The Fuchsia Ocean / Zero Waste - Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Hiccupism / Silence please - Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Baby Mayor / Sink or Swim - The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day. // The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep112
programme.desc: Daddy Shack - After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Anna and her friends are outside playing Ron's favorite game, Hide-and-Seek! Anna is the Seeker and quickly finds Froga, Christopher and Bubu. When the friends work together to try to find Ron, they realize he's found the best hiding spot of all.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep102
programme.desc: The Swing - When Anna and Froga discover the old seat of their swing, they are excited to hang it on the apple tree. But the ropes to attach it have gone missing!The two friends' search for the missing ropes turns out to be more difficult than they had imagined!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep105
programme.desc: The Photo - Polaroid camera, she decides to take pictures of all her friends. Everyone thinks it's a great idea and Anna makes some great portraits. But things get complicated when she tries to take a group shot of everyone!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep109
programme.desc: The Bicycle - Bubu impresses his friends with a brand new bike he won in a contest. He encourages everyone else to ride it, Anna discovers why: Bubu doesn't know how to ride a two-wheeler!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep112
programme.desc: The Mosquito - Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep129
programme.desc: Froga's Hat - Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep224
programme.desc: The Balloon Ride - Peppa wins the top prize in a raffle at school: a trip in a hot air balloon. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb aboard and enjoy the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, the balloon has landed in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep225
programme.desc: George Catches a Cold - Peppa and George love jumping in puddles, even when it’s raining – but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold. After a while George is feeling much better. Now he’s more than happy to wear his rain hat, even when it’s not raining.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep226
programme.desc: The Eye Test - Pedro Pony wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need glasses too, so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician. Peppa is a little disappointed to discover that she has perfect vision – but that doesn’t stop her wearing some rather fabulous sunglasses.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep227
programme.desc: The Long Grass - The grass has grown so long that Peppa and George's ball gets lost. Grandpa arrives with his fantastic lawnmower and gets the grass cut in no time. Peppa and George find their plastic ball again and it bounces brilliantly on the short grass!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep321
programme.desc: Trip to the Moon - Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep322
programme.desc: Grandpa at the Playground - Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and George to the playground, but does not understand the children's rules.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep323
programme.desc: Goldie the Fish - Goldie the fish does not look happy and is not eating her food, so Peppa, George and Mummy Pig take her on a bus trip to visit Dr Hamster the vet.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep108
programme.desc: The Competition Prize - The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Clock and Dance / Barbapileup - The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S4 Ep408
programme.desc: T-Rex Trouble - Blaze and Zeg are in Dinosaur Valley, showing off their amazing robot powers to their dinosaur friends. But when they discover three lost little Tyrannosauruses, they must use their robot powers to get the babies home safely.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S3 Ep310
programme.desc: Animal Island - Blaze and Stripes sail to Animal Island - an incredible place inhabited by monster truck animals! But when a greedy lizard puts the island in peril, Blaze and Stripes must find their wild side to save their animal friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep802
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sweet Mayor / Pups Save a Magic Trick - Encased in a huge chocolate bunny, Humdinger is carried away by hungry raccoons and ends up floating in Adventure Bay with a curious dolphin. // When a magic trick goes awry, the Adventure Bay Easter Festival is overrun by wild bunnies.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep803
programme.desc: Pups Save a Rubble-Double / Pups Save a Clown - Rubble dreams that he's been taken aboard a spaceship and meets his alien double. When the ship crashes on an alien planet, he needs help. // The Pups must save Humdinger and his kittens when they mess around with Toodles the Clown's tiny clown car.

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep216
programme.desc: Wheel of Steel/Bobbi's Bongos - Some changes to the design of Kai's big Ferris wheel, that Sir Steel makes don't go quite the way he thought they would! // Bobbi and Ian's musical talents are recognized but if they go on a world Tour, what will happen to the Deer Squad?

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep219
programme.desc: Den Build Disaster - Kai tries to impress with his super den, but his leaf blower invention frightens the baby animals.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Paddington and the Summer Games / Paddington Goes Camping - The Browns are having their annual summer games. Will Paddington be good at any of them? // Mrs. Brown has bought an old camper van and decides to take the family on a camping holiday.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Paddington and the Fundraising Day / Paddington's Alien Adventure - The town hall is leaking and needs a new roof, and Paddington must stay silent to raise the money. // Will the strange radio messages Jonathan is receiving mean visitors are arriving from another world? Paddington forms a greeting committee!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep305
programme.desc: The Camper Van - Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep306
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday - Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Compost - Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep308
programme.desc: Richard Rabbit Comes to Play - Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S6 Ep606
programme.desc: Winter Sports Chompetition! - Gil and Bubble Puppy are competing in the Winter Sports Chompetition--a competition for athletes and their dogs! Will they be able to stop reigning champs Coldsnap and his dog Mr. Husky from cheating to win the gold?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep313
programme.desc: Sage and Ginger's Baby Book - Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are trying to take a photo of Sage and Ginger for their baby book, but they just can't seem to make the twins smile. We'll play a?silly?game of Blue's Clues to figure?out how to make the?twins giggle!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep314
programme.desc: Joshini The Amazing - Periwinkle is planning a magic show! The Amazing Joshini and YOU, are eager to perform the greatest magic trick the Blue's Clues house has ever seen! But which one? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it?out.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep108
programme.desc: The Treasure in the Sky / Sidekick Switcheroo - After finding a cosmic treasure map, Santiago and crew take to the stars to track the treasure down. // During a high seas scuffle, Kiko and Sir Butterscotch swap places!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep207
programme.desc: Bonnie's Mom - Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep203
programme.desc: The Secret Password - The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Captain Kelp - As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Bread - Tiny Chef bakes bread but forgets to watch his rising dough and needs to think fast when the dough grows too big!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep804
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Cheetah - When the Cheetah swipes the Paw Patroller to fulfill her nefarious plan to destroy the jungle and build the cheating-est racetrack ever, the Paw Patrol must get a brand vehicle and stop her!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep210
programme.desc: Paddington the Upcycler - Baaz teaches Jonathan & Paddington about upcycling but can the pair create something to earn a reward.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep232
programme.desc: Ice Skating - Peppa and George are going ice-skating for the first time. Mummy Pig teaches Peppa to skate and soon she is having lots of fun. Peppa begins to teach George how to skate but it turns out he is a natural born skater. Peppa and George love ice-skating.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep233
programme.desc: Dentist - Peppa and George are at the dentist. Dr Elephant says that Peppa and George’s teeth are lovely and clean. But George’s plastic toy “Mr Dinosaur” teeth are a bit yellow. Dr Elephant polishes Mr Dinosaurs teeth until they are bright and shiny.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep234
programme.desc: Dens - Peppa is playing in the tree-house with the girls, and George and the boys stay in the castle that Grandpa Pig built for them. But when it starts to rain and the garden is covered in muddy puddles, they rush out to play together!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep123
programme.desc: Prank Day - Today is Prank day, Anna and her friends must compete to elect the best prankster of all. Everyone's doing a great except Christopher. The friends are surprised when the worst prankster turns out to be the best!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep124
programme.desc: A Present for Ron - Christopher loves Ron's rock collection so much, he wants to add another beautiful rock to it! They set off on a journey to find the most amazing rock they can find. When they discover it - they must figure out a creative solution to get it to Ron!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Making Bread / From One Pit to Another - Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep316
programme.desc: Feelin' Filipino - Lola is missing her hometown in the Philippines, so Josh surprises her by bringing the Philippines to the house! We explore Filipino culture and family traditions as we play Blue's Clues.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep810
programme.desc: Pups and Katie Stop the Barking Kitty Crew! / Pups Save the Glasses - When Mayor Humdinger disrupts Adventure Bay with his "barking" kitties, Katie and the pups must rescue the town. // Cap'n Turbot loses his glasses and creates chaos in his path. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save him and his specs!

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep216
programme.desc: Wheel of Steel/Bobbi's Bongos - Some changes to the design of Kai's big Ferris wheel, that Sir Steel makes don't go quite the way he thought they would! // Bobbi and Ian's musical talents are recognized but if they go on a world Tour, what will happen to the Deer Squad?

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep217
programme.desc: Fountain Fiasco/Night of the Disco Lights - Who has put a new fountain in Crystal Lake which is against Park Rules? And it's upsetting Fish Hook! // Sir Steel thinks the deer have stolen Steel Tower's lights, so decides to take theirs with his new Light Sucker!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep122
programme.desc: Paddington Builds Scarecrow / Paddington Plays Hide and Seek - Paddington accidentally ruins Mr. Browns lovely lawn and must repair it. But the birds take a liking to the seeds so he builds a Scarecrow. // Mrs. Bird is a champion hide and seeker but where is she? Paddington, Jonathan and Judy mus go find her.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Quesadillas - Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favorite jar of salsa open no matter how hard he and his friends try!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen - Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Clock and Dance / Barbapileup - The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Captain Kelp / Teensy the Tardigrade - As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep202
programme.desc: Blizzard Wizard - When the owner of Iceberg Ice Cream, Scoops, has to rush out on a frosty emergency, he leaves Baby Shark and William in charge of his parlor.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep122
programme.desc: Party Time - Anna and Froga want to throw a party..... since it is not a particular party day they decide to celebrate "Tomato Day", But Christopher ate all of the tomatoes ... so they need to find another name... Anna finds the perfect name: Friendship party!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep166
programme.desc: The Squeaky Boots - Christopher leads the friends in a fun game of HIDE AND SEEK. But Froga soon realizes that her new boots are letting out a noisy SQEEEAK. When a pesky mosquito enters the picture and threatens to ruin the winning prize!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep168
programme.desc: A Longchair for Ron - A sleeping spider squats Ron's swing, and he can't take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep171
programme.desc: Bubu's New Blue Jeans - Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubu's new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brand-new pair to the event, he becomes overly concerned of getting them dirty.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep173
programme.desc: The Blue Butterfly - Anna and her friends are on a mission to capture a photograph of a pretty flower, but on the search, they see a beautiful blue butterfly. The friends finally discover the best way to capture their enchanting photo.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep176
programme.desc: The Quiet Game - After talking so much to her plants, Froga decides to save her voice by playing THE QUIET GAME. When she lays out the objective that her friends need to try to make her talk - it becomes a fun challenge for the gang to get her to crack.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep238
programme.desc: The baby Piggy - Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chloé and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chloé have a great idea;

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep239
programme.desc: Nature Trail - Peppa and her family are driving out to the countryside to go for a walk in the woods. Peppa and George discover trails of footprints left by little birds and ants.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep240
programme.desc: Pretend Friend - Suzy Sheep has made up a pretend friend called “Leo Lion”. Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy says that Leo likes roaring and dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo. Even Mummy and Daddy Pig play along. But George feels a bit left out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep241
programme.desc: Pen Pal - Peppa has a French pen pal, a girl donkey, named Delphine. They also speak to each other on the telephone. Although Peppa speaks English and Delphine speaks French, they discover that they love lots of the same things.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep324
programme.desc: Fun Fair - The family go to the funfair, but Mummy Pig is angry when people at the fair tell her that she will not be able to win prizes in the competitions, just like George is sad because the mini golf course is too big for him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep325
programme.desc: Numbers - Peppa and her friends learn how to count by playing games at Madame Gazelle's daycare.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep326
programme.desc: Digging Up the Road - Peppa and her family are trying to get to the playground, but Mr Bull's roadworks are in the way.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Marvelous Moustaches - Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Relay Tales / The Barbababies' World - Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S4 Ep409
programme.desc: Meatball Mayhem - When Crusher accidentally knocks a bottle of "grow spice" onto a meatball, it grows to an enormous size and rolls away! It's up to Blaze and Pickle to transform into robots and stop the meatball before it wrecks the entire town!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S3 Ep314
programme.desc: Ready, Set, Roar! - Blaze and Stripes transform into ferociously fast jungle cats to race in the Animal Island Championship! But to win, they’ll have to beat Crusher disguised as a cheating cheetah. Can they claw their way to victory?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep807
programme.desc: Pups Save The Hiding Elephants / Pups Save a Yodeler - Elephants become trapped in the Monkey Temple after a bee frightens them away from their watering hole. // When Wingnut runs away from wolves that are attracted to his yodeling, he ends up trapped in a canyon. The Paw Patrol has to hurry to save him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep808
programme.desc: Pups Save the Dizzy Dust Express / Pups Save the Treetop Trekkers - When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers. // Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle zip-lining adventure.

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep218
programme.desc: Cosmic Circus/A Hole Lot of Trouble - Sir Steel's circus takes Lady Fluffpot out of this world, can the Deer Squad bring her back to earth safely? // Bobbi gets carried away while digging for ground nuts and puts the forest and its residents in real danger.

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep220
programme.desc: Forest Squad in Space - An adventure in space awaits the newest heroes in town when the Deer Squad take the Forest Squad with them on a mission.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep119
programme.desc: Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons - Jonathan has lost his balloon, Paddington tries to get him a new one but accidentally ends up flying all over London. // After a neighborhood watch talk Paddington decides to go on patrol as an unofficial policeman. Soon he has to solve a real crime.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Paddington and the FIre Engine / Paddington Joins a Club - Paddington is impressed by a safety talk from the local fire brigade. When there is a real emergency, Paddington to the rescue! // Mateo and Judy form a secret club in the treehouse but won't let Jonathan and Paddington join without a password.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep320
programme.desc: Talent Day - It is Talent Day at Peppa's daycare. Madame Gazelle wants everyone to show the class their special talent.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep321
programme.desc: Trip to the Moon - Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep322
programme.desc: Grandpa at the Playground - Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and George to the playground, but does not understand the children's rules.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep323
programme.desc: Goldie the Fish - Goldie the fish does not look happy and is not eating her food, so Peppa, George and Mummy Pig take her on a bus trip to visit Dr Hamster the vet.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S6 Ep607
programme.desc: Robo Puppy! - When a bossy cyborg named the Glitch hacks all the robots in Robotopolis and forces them to dance "The Robot," it's up to Robot Mechanic Molly and Robo Puppy to stop him before it's too late!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep317
programme.desc: Into the Blueniverse - It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into Blueniverse. Where in the Blueniverse is Magenta's spaceship? We'll play Blue's Clues to find out!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep318
programme.desc: Rainbow Puppy's Skidoo Adventure - Josh and Blue are having a playdate with our friend Rainbow Puppy, who makes everything extra exciting! We play a special game of Rainbow Puppy's Clues to figure out where she wants to go, leaping from skidoo to skidoo and looking for clues.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep112
programme.desc: Deep Freeze / The Trojan Seahorse - The biggest party of the year could be cancelled after Escarlata la Pirata freezes the high seas! // Bonnie Bones is on the run with the museum's priceless treasures, but Santi and crew won't let her get far.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep96
programme.desc: Take Off - Po collects lots of balloons and takes off into the air! Floating high above Teletubbyland, Po waves at Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Laa‐Laa below. When the balloons pop, Po lands.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S5) Ep1
programme.desc: Rain - Dee encourages a friend to say 'rain' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. Today's episode is all about rain!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep20
programme.desc: Pop Music - When a Grampa Po moves to an upstairs apartment, he misses the sweet music played by the Kid Po on the ground floor.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) Ep26
programme.desc: It's Time to Bury a Time Capsule - When JoJo, Gran Gran and the Nature Club dig up a buried time capsule, they reunite the capsule's owners with their belongings - then bury a new one of their own!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep54
programme.desc: Parcel Puzzle - When Violet tells Monty that a problem is too big for a little boy to solve, he wonders if only big people can solve big problems.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep53
programme.desc: Take a Break - When Monty sees Violet enjoying doing absolutely nothing, he starts to wonder if it is a good thing to take a break and relax.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep52
programme.desc: Easter - It's the night before Easter and Bluey and Bingo are worried the Easter bunny is going to forget about them like last year.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep39
programme.desc: The Getting On Badge - When the squirrels upset the mole by being noisy, Duggee suggests ways that they can all live underground peacefully.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep38
programme.desc: The Dressing Up Badge - Norrie suggests a dressing up party to celebrate Enid's birthday.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep37
programme.desc: The Traffic Badge - It's a hot day so Duggee is treating the Squirrels to a trip to the tropical lake. It's particularly busy out today and there's a traffic jam! Thank goodness Duggee has his traffic badge. He knows what to do!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep11
programme.desc: Harbin Ice City, China - GrimHQ overheats so lands in Harbin Ice City, melting the amazing ice sculptures.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep10
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Hailstorm - Can the Go Jetters brand new click-on save the GoJet Academy from a glitched thunderstorm?

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep51
programme.desc: Christmas Swim - The Heelers gather for a classic Aussie Christmas. Bluey gets a new teddy and introduces him to the whole family, but the family play too rough with him and now he wants to go home.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep50
programme.desc: Grandad - Grandad is supposed to be resting, but when Bluey and Bingo go to visit him, he makes a run for it with the kids and takes them on a madcap adventure into the bush.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures (S1) Ep26
programme.desc: Andy and The Armadillo - Andy jets off in his safari-mobile to South America in search of an armadillo. He needs to photograph one for the front cover of a new magazine, but try as he might, it continually eludes him.

programme.title: My Pet and Me: Vet Tales (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: The Kittens - Ferne visits Thomas and William and their kittens as they head off to the vet for their very first check up. Meanwhile, Rory travels to a wildlife park to meet the vet team who need to check on some of their new arrivals.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S7) Ep12
programme.desc: Smart Parrot - Captain Captain, Sandy and Seaweed get a new 'Smart Parrot' to help make life easier around the Scarlet Squid. Unfortunately it only ends up making life harder for the pirates!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep36
programme.desc: The Water Badge - The squirrels learn all about where water comes from, and their journey takes them from the sea and back to the kitchen sink and another drink of water. Wow! Water is amazing!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep35
programme.desc: The Brave Banana Badge - When thunder and lightning scares the squirrels, Duggee teaches them about bravery.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep34
programme.desc: The Sleeping Badge - Tag is having trouble sleeping, so Duggee offers him a few tricks to help him.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep9
programme.desc: Seattle Space Needle, USA - The team goes where no Go Jetter has gone before, when Glitch tries to launch into space.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep8
programme.desc: Venice, Italy - The Go Jetters get a sinking feeling when Glitch turns the canals of Venice into roads.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S15) Ep13
programme.desc: Stop That Bus! - Bertie the Bus is waiting to pick up Dowager Hatt and her friends, but Thomas takes him on a tour instead. Unfortunately, Bertie ends up becoming stranded on the Shake Shake Bridge.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep11
programme.desc: Mountain Mints - Scarf Lady takes Sarah and Duck on trip up the mountains. At the top of a mountain they find Poetry Pete reading a poem.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep10
programme.desc: Auto Cat - Duck has some competition for Sarah's attention when a brand new toy arrives.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep31
programme.desc: Sand Monsters - Sand Monster Nelly and Sand Monster Nora love to knock down sand castles!

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) Ep39
programme.desc: Dog Loves Amazing Facts - Dog and Pug are talking facts and they go on an adventure to check one of Pug's facts. In the Fact Wherehouse they meet Wow the Owl who appears to know everything.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep52
programme.desc: The Greatest Gift - Monty has no money to buy a gift for his mum. He wonders if a gift has to be large or cost money to be special.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep20
programme.desc: The Thing That Was Scary - Tony runs into a cave where a scary thing lives. Can Gwen and Bob out-scare it and get him back?

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep19
programme.desc: A Different Beat - Can Team Tinpo complete a task together when Logi-Po and Hack-Po want to work to a different kind of beat?

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep18
programme.desc: What Goes Up - When Mo's kite gets stuck up on an office roof, the team rescue it in a down-to-earth way.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: The Weekend - At the weekend, Bluey and Bingo are playing in the garden with Dad. But Bingo gets upset when she discovers a walking leaf insect and Dad doesn't notice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep33
programme.desc: The Island Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels are out doing a bit of sailing. What fun! When Tag starts to feel a little bit seasick Duggee suggests a stop off at the Island for a spot of lunch, but where's all the food?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep32
programme.desc: The Voice Badge - When the Squirrels start talking to each other in the wrong voices it's clear something has gone awry. But Duggee has his voice badge. He knows what to do!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep31
programme.desc: The Stick Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels are preparing to have a campfire. Duggee is getting it ready and needs the Squirrels to help find lots of wood for it.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep7
programme.desc: Avenue of the Baobabs, Madagascar - GrimHQ crashes into the Baobab trees. Can the Go Jetters rescue a baby lemur in time?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep6
programme.desc: Machu Picchu, Peru - A giant grimbot bounces down the valley of Machu Picchu. Can the Go Jetters stop him?

programme.title: The Numtums (S1) Ep43
programme.desc: Little Sandy's Big Bug Hunt - The Numtums are on a quest to find the Lesser Spotted Ladybird and to find Larry who has the Super Numtum comic.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin Off / Tooth and Consequences - After seeing CJ's awesome spin moves, Par helps CJ enter and train for a sign spinning competition! // When Adelaide loses a tooth, Carl and Bobby teach her about El Raton, the Latin American "tooth fairy."

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep156
programme.desc: Frozen Face Off - Everyone in Bikini Bottom is competing in a worm-sled race to the South Pole. Will SpongeBob and the gang make it to the frosty finish line to claim the big prize…one million clams!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep157
programme.desc: Squidward's School for Grown Ups / Oral Report - When Pat suddenly grows a very grown-up beard, he decides it’s time to act like a grown-up, too. // While preparing to give an oral report for boating school, SpongeBob realizes that he’s got a horrible case of stage fright.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep158
programme.desc: Sweet and Sour Squidward / The Googly Artiste - Plankton tries to befriend Squidward in an effort to steal the Krabby Patty formula. // Patrick tries desperately to supply everyone in Bikini Bottom with his highly demanded “rocks-with-googly-eyes,” after an art critic deems him a true artiste.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep159
programme.desc: A SquarePants Family Vacation - When SpongeBob and Patrick get lost on a family road trip to the Great Barrier Reef, they end up on the adventure of a lifetime.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Pam & Jelly / Inside Angus - After Jelly goes missing, Parker and Lily volunteer to help Ms. Pam find her. // After accidentally swallowing an irreplaceable Shackleton family stamp, Parker goes inside Angus to retrieve it.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Closed for Cocooning - Parker wants to help Lily's sisters plan her "Wing Ding," but it's clear the little nimbus doesn't quite fit in.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Qilin Time - Po is embarrassed when his dad takes him on a wild goose chase, but it turns out his dad is not so crazy afterall.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep211
programme.desc: A Tigress Tale - When Master Mugan from the Garnet Palace desides she needs a new Kung Fu Master, Tigress volunteers. Will the Furious Five be minus one or will Po convince Tigress to return to the Jade Palace?

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Zuko Alone - Traveling without Uncle now, Zuko wanders alone into an Earth Kingdom town where he bonds with a local boy. Meanwhile, Zuko is haunted by memories of his own youth.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Action Reaction - Skipper is forced to live his worst nightmare when he's doused with Inflatium and stress causes him to blow up like a balloon.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Marble Jar Head / Good Night and Good Chuck - How in the world is Rico supposed to behave well when King Julien has kidnapped his doll, Miss Perky? // When the Penguins try to get the anchor man Chuck Charles back on TV they find themselves in front of the camera.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Littlefoot / Smotherly Love - Marlene is dying to go see a concert in the park. But, every time she leaves the zoo she becomes a feral monster! // Ma, an empty-nested mother possum, takes up residence in the Penguins Lair after they destroy her home.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Employee of the Month / Brocrastination - Buhdeuce's life is about to change forever when SwaySway gives out an award. // SwaySway and Buhdeuce have to take care of a pile of dirty dishes, before IT takes care of THEM!

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Off to See the Wizard - Brendar and Evan travel to Horus' castle, where the wizard hires her to defeat the evil witch who turned his daughter into an owl. Brendar chooses Axe as her payment, while Evan has to prove he's worthy of going with the group on the quest.

programme.title: Roger
programme.desc: Roger tells Fatou a joke and it’s a really stupid joke because Roger can’t tell it right and it’s really embarrassing for Fatou because she really doesn’t dare tell her friend that he is a terrible joke teller. Still, Roger is aware of his shortcomings and is sorry, he knows he blew it. He would like so much to make Fatou laugh with a good joke, kind of like Igor does. So he decides to take joke-telling lessons with Igor, since Igor is apparently the king of jokes. But it backfires, Roger is still way too serious! But still determined to make Fatou laugh at one of his jokes, the alien decides that science is the solution. He invents a laughter ray which accompanies his jokes and it turns out to work pretty well. In fact so well that Irina, who is inadvertently struck by the ray, can’t stop laughing herself...to the point of endangering her life...!

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.desc: Matchday 31 - The Bundesliga is reaching its climax with everything still to play for: the title, Champions League qualification, relegation. At the top, just one point separates Bayern and Dortmund. Elsewhere, Freiburg and Union can strengthen their places in the top four against Leipzig and Augsburg. And at the bottom, Hertha and Stuttgart go head-to-head. Kick Off! brings you all the drama.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC272CovingtonvsMasvidal
programme.desc: Former friends and teammates turned bitter rivals, Colby “Chaos” Covington and Jorge “Gamebred” Masvidal headlined an action-packed card for UFC 272. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep903VolkanovskivsOrtega
programme.desc: Undefeated in the UFC and reigning featherweight champion, Alexander Volkanovski defends his title against Jiu-Jitsu savant, Brian “T-City” Ortega at UFC 266. See both men train and prepare to fight for the UFC’s 145-pound title.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC273VolkanovskivsTheKoreanZombie
programme.desc: UFC 273 featured UFC featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski carve out his legacy as one of the best ever as he faces The Korean Zombie. Plus, a heated rivalry in the co-main event as Aljamain Sterling and Petr Yan rematch for the undisputed bantamweight title. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep11
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep16
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep4
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1003MorenovsFigueiredo3
programme.desc: UFC 270 featured the third meeting between flyweight rivals Deiveson Figueiredo and Mexican champion Brandon Moreno. Relive their incredible battle like you’ve never seen it with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2308
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: CryptoData Motorrad Grand Prix von Österreich Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The MotoGP World Championship returned to Austria in 2016 after a break of 18 years, with the country hosting a motorcycle Grand Prix event at the Red Bull Ring in Spielberg - the last time being in 1997. Austria’s first Grand Prix took place in 1971 at the Salzburgring circuit, which hosted Grand Prix racing on a total of 22 occasions, until 1994. The Spielberg Red Bull Ring is beautifully situated in the Murtal region of Styria and was originally built in 1969, then known as the Österreichring. In 1996 it was rebuilt with the track-layout it still has today, and hosted Grand Prix events for two years as the ‘A1-Ring’, before being reopened as the ‘Red Bull Ring’ in 2011.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2308
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Song vs. Simon
programme.desc: Prelims - With five consecutive victories, including back-to-back finishes of Raphael Assuncao and Jack Shore, Ricky Simon put himself on the fast track to a shot at the bantamweight title, but on April 29, he will have to make his case even stronger by getting past Chinese contender Song Yadong in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Winner of three of his last four, with knockouts of Julio Arce and Marlon Moraes, Song can change the direction of a fight with one punch, and he plans on letting Simon know that as soon as the Octagon door shuts

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Song vs. Simon

programme.desc: Highlights - The MotoGP World Championship returned to Austria in 2016 after a break of 18 years, with the country hosting a motorcycle Grand Prix event at the Red Bull Ring in Spielberg - the last time being in 1997. Austria’s first Grand Prix took place in 1971 at the Salzburgring circuit, which hosted Grand Prix racing on a total of 22 occasions, until 1994. The Spielberg Red Bull Ring is beautifully situated in the Murtal region of Styria and was originally built in 1969, then known as the Österreichring. In 1996 it was rebuilt with the track-layout it still has today, and hosted Grand Prix events for two years as the ‘A1-Ring’, before being reopened as the ‘Red Bull Ring’ in 2011.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2308

programme.title: UFC 288: Sterling vs. Cejudo
programme.desc: Prelims - The bad blood has been boiling, and on May 7, UFC bantamweight champion Aljamain Sterling and Henry “Triple C” Cejudo will settle their score in the main event of UFC 288 at Prudential Center in Newark, New Jersey. Returning to the Octagon for the first time since his May 2020 victory over Dominick Cruz, Cejudo is one of the most decorated athletes in combat sports with an Olympic gold medal in wrestling and bantamweight and flyweight world titles in the UFC. But on this Cinco de Mayo weekend, the proud Mexican-American will be in with the best bantamweight in the world in Sterling, the current titleholder who has won eight in a row, defeating Cory Sandhagen, Petr Yan and TJ Dillashaw along the way.

programme.title: UFC 288: Sterling vs. Cejudo
programme.desc: Main Event - The bad blood has been boiling, and on May 7, UFC bantamweight champion Aljamain Sterling and Henry “Triple C” Cejudo will settle their score in the main event of UFC 288 at Prudential Center in Newark, New Jersey. Returning to the Octagon for the first time since his May 2020 victory over Dominick Cruz, Cejudo is one of the most decorated athletes in combat sports with an Olympic gold medal in wrestling and bantamweight and flyweight world titles in the UFC. programme.desc: Prelims - With five consecutive victories, including back-to-back finishes of Raphael Assuncao and Jack Shore, Ricky Simon put himself on the fast track to a shot at the bantamweight title, but on April 29, he will have to make his case even stronger by getting past Chinese contender Song Yadong in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas.
